<s> I just finished well started and finished the Twilight series over the weekend <s> I 've been sick so I 've had some extra time on my hands As a literature minor I 'd been curious about the books I 'd heard were 'well written 'I wanted to read them to see what the big deal was Starting the books I was initially annoyed <s> The melodramatic character of Bella Swan is a whiny irritatingly so obsessive dark misunderstood misfit or so she feels <s> But as I continued the first book I got attached to its brilliance <s> Stephanie Meyer captures the emotions passion fear and romance for her primary audience of romantically inexperienced preteen and teenage girls <s> She creates an overwhelming dichotomy of passionate love and perfect friendship with the characters of Edward Cullen and Jacob Black In the end I would never call the series a literary masterpiece <s> However its brilliance to entrap the hearts of girls everywhere is undeniable <s> Even as I was reading it I felt myself believing in what Edward and Bella have despite knowing how unrealistic their relationship is outside of the whole vampire thing Deep down every girl wants an 'Edward '--a man who is incredibly passionate who believes and shares with her that he would die without her <s> She wants a love relationship where the spark never dies where every kiss is more intense than the last and where the chemistry tears through her insides <s> And she wants a man who longs for her to be with him at all times who misses her intensely when they are apart who protects her in every situation and who knows without a doubt that she is his soulmate 
<s> So to start this off it was just a normal day <s> I hung with my friends all day and had a blast <s> Well we all decided to drink that night <s> So I got some alcohol and invited some people over to have a little get-together <s> Bad idea <s> It was about 1am and the cops got called for a noise disturbance <s> Obviously we were being loud but personally I didn 't feel we were <s> Well as you all know when a minor is intoxicated they automatically get an MIP <s> Well everyone in my room got one <s> Which I find completely unfair considering the fact that everyone in the house except my Grandmother was drinking <s> Well once everyone went home I was laying there thinking <s> Thinking if this is truly how I want my life to be <s> If I wanted to grow up with a criminal record <s> If I wanted to grow up an alcoholic <s> If I wanted to grow up not knowing if my life could be any better then what it is 
<s> So many things are changing yet everything is the same <s> I have not worked much since <date> <s> Soon all the things I have routinely done at home will come to a halt baking gardening park day <s> I will instead spend the weekends working shows in Virginia and Maryland visiting with friends sleeping in different beds and driving rental vans <s> I will not be able to lean on Paul to back me up For many months I had the regularity of meditation and exercise keeping me on track I was feeling good about going into the new working year but for the past 2 months I have had a swollen knee due to a torn meniscus which has put a halt to the intense work out I was enjoying <s> I am not sure why I lost the Breathe I don 't hold onto familiarity and I am not dependent on regularity <s> I have never really felt settled anywhere <s> Many many years ago I was working on the Celestine Prophecy workbook and one of the tasks was to connect the dots that lead to where you are now <s> In other words what events brought me here right now <s> The goal was to understand that there are always many choices we can make and the one we do make is significant to where we go It is what we do in the moment that leads to the next moment <s> I believe I understand with such clarity why I chose to live on St <s> Thomas because it had everything I 'thought I wanted 'and everything I really did want I often wonder why I moved to Las Vegas <s> What is the lesson What was the need I believe I moved to Las Vegas to learn how to be a better parent <s> I moved here to meet more people who reassure me that by listening to my gut connecting with my child and considering his father I will make the best choices to leave upon my son After only a month of moving into our home I contacted a homeschooling group who is description appealed to me 'We hope to support and inspire each other on our journeys of living and learning <s> Because respect for the child is at the core of unschooling we expect our members to act accordingly on the list and in real life gatherings <s> We embrace diversity and hope that all who join our group will respect each others ' differences and remain open to learning from each other 'This group is members have changed since I first joined <s> There are only 3 families from our original beginnings that are still regulars in the group <s> Las Vegas like St <s> Thomas is filled with transients One of the Four Noble Truths The origin of suffering is attachment to transient things and the ignorance thereof <s> When I meet a friend I know they are not permanent that my happiness does not rely on their being but I know that just by calling them friend they have given me a little more understanding of my true self <s> They have left a lasting impression Another transient though born here is leaving for life on the road and one I call friend is leaving the <weirdcaps> she is moving on following her heart facing her fears and becoming her true self <s> And again I realize that things will change <s> Our ego wants us to believe these changes are dramatic but in reality they are subtle My ego misses my friend tonight <s> My ego sheds tears for the absent Wednesday chair I am feeling shaken and stirred <s> It is time to remember to how to breathe

<s> Introducing Cole Isaac Gilbert The baby is here Thanks to everyone who has helped out in the past few weeks especially those guest posters I 'll continue to be on semi-maternity leave over the next few weeks but I wanted to share the good news and my birth story for those interested Cheers Christine Cole Isaac Gilbert Born <date> 9 50 PM 8 lbs 12 oz 21 inches long 'The Cure ' I had breezed past my due date and by Friday my midwife wanted me to get an ultrasound to make sure the baby was still thriving in his post <math> week world We were planning a homebirth a carefully weighed decision based in part on the nearly perfect health I had been experiencing throughout the pregnancy and my strong desire to avoid a c-section especially since we would be birthing in the <smiley> where c-section rates top <math> <s> It is not a choice for everyone but we were well-educated about the options and it felt right That afternoon I ate lunch and headed over to the ultrasound appointment Drew and I sat in silence as the tech tried to jiggle our baby into movement The bio physical scan scored the baby based on 4 types of movement from rolling over to 'practice breathing ' Our score Zero I drank some juice I poked the baby and wiggled my abs After 30 minutes our midwife transferred us to the hospital for more tests The baby wasn 't moving Remember that perfectly healthy pregnancy I talked about Well apparently on Week 40 Day 4 I developed pregnancy induced hypertension Normally you 'd see this after the six month point when the women is blood pressure starts to creep up and her kidneys begin dropping protein into the urine and her feet and hands might get really swollen According to the blood work I had moved past that first stage of just hypertension beyond mild pre-eclampsia and was now looking at some of the scarier effects like my kidneys not working correctly blood clotting issues and potential seizures when blood pressure in a pregnant women gets too high they don 't stroke out they have a seizure fun fact The cure The doctor sat down and tried to couch it as nicely as possible 'The only cure is to have this baby ' We didn 't freak out in fact we were very calm about the matter We spent about 30 minutes quizzing the doctor on the relative merits of induction verses cesarean the likelihood of success based on cervical favorably bishop score and methods used and ultimately what did he think was the safest for everyone involved 'If it was my wife or daughter A c-section ' I think everyone the doctor nurses and midwife included were a bit surprised when we said 'Okay ' Maybe they expected us to fight it to try to come up with some way to birth at home or to take the insane risk of disregarding the medical advice we had been given But to us a home birth was about safety not about some ego-driven one upmanship over our child-bearing peers A low risk healthy birth is safest when left alone but all of that goes out of the window once there is complications If you are sick if your baby is at risk you want a doctor there That is why we did the tests and ultrasounds to rule out anything that would cause us problems down the road Well it worked I signed the paperwork and they prepped me for surgery I won 't go into too much detail about the actual surgery as it is not pleasant You wouldn 't expect it to be I am sure but I might have of had a slightly harder time than other women as the spinal made me extremely sick There is one moment I 'll always remember though and it is the single bright spot in the experience I was gasping for breath from beneath the sickly plasticy smelling oxygen mask with my own vomit drying on my face and in my hair trying to not succumb again and I heard my baby is first cry I couldn 't have been further from the moment forgetting completely why I was subjecting myself to this and his piercing scream pulled me right back I burst into tears and felt this clear indescribable joy Afterward I got everything I wanted Cole was alert and latched an hour after surgery when they stabilized me enough to permit breastfeeding I stayed up with him most of the night marveling his perfect little features the way he pouted my husband says he gets this from me and the way his breathing gets excited as he gets close to me I had spent all this time planning the perfect birth and I got almost none of my wishes except one A healthy baby Later I would tell Drew that the disappointment the anger the sadness of having our plans dashed would take time to heal Really though it hasn 't been time the cure has been Cole Being with him has been so opposite so perfectly wonderful it is redemptive I feel like I won the baby lottery 
<s> Today is guest post is from Alison at http cheeseweb eu a very cool expat blogger I especially liked this post for the insight into expat life but also a new twist on the 'Why Blog ' debate Once you 're done reading this be sure to check out her excellent photography here When I started blogging I wasn 't trying to make money on-line or become famous <s> In fact I never expected anyone other than my friends and family would read it <s> But now I am pretty sure that blogging saved my expat life I moved to Belgium five years ago as a trailing spouse <s> My husband and I decided together that we wanted to try living in Europe <s> The opportunity came up sooner than we expected when his company offered to move us to Brussels <s> Legalities being what they are in Belgium I was unable to get a work-permit as the trailing spouse so my days were filled with getting our new life settled Back then blogging wasn 't as ubiquitous as it is now and I didn 't know much about it but I got tired of writing the same things and answering the same questions in a dozen e-mails <s> I had learned basic web design and HTML in school so I decided to start a website to share stories and photos with my friends and family back home My blog posts were basically extended letters <s> I didn 't think much about grammar or structure <s> My posts didn 't have a topic other than what I had been up to since the last time I wrote <s> I never expected anyone that didn 't know me would bother much with my blog In those first few months I wrote only about happy things new places we travelled to new discoveries we made etc The shiny newness of expat life wore off pretty quickly though <s> The reality was I was mired in mountains of Belgian bureaucracy and red-tape <s> We had no support from my husband is company we didn 't speak the language we knew no one and we lived in a small community with limited public transportation <s> I spent most of my days feeling isolated and depressed and wondering what the hell I had done I didn 't want to burden my family and friends with my woes <s> Honestly I felt like a failure for being depressed in the first place <s> I mean I was living in Europe after all <s> Something that is a dream for most people was my reality <s> Except most days it felt more like a nightmare I turned to the blogosphere for help <s> Although there weren 't many expat blogs based in Belgium at that time I found some blogs written by expat women in other countries who were writing about the exact feelings I was having <s> Su 'enly I didn 't feel so alone and it gave me the courage to write about what I was really experiencing It was scary to put my stress struggles and depression out there but instead of scorn for my whining I started to get email and comments from other women in my situation <s> Some were already in Belgium some were planning an expat move and all of them had similar fears and worries as me I was contacted by an expat news website in Belgium and asked to do a weekly column about my experiences in Belgium <s> Through that column even more trailing spouses contacted me and encouraged me to keep writing and sharing It didn 't happen overnight but gradually things got better <s> Because of my blog I met people I had an outlet for my stress and worry and I had a sense of purpose <s> Blogging and the support of my readers gave me the courage to pursue my career as a photographer Five years later my blog and my life have changed dramatically <s> First of all we have both moved out of isolation me to the centre of Brussels and my blog to its own domain <weirdcaps> is now much less focused on my day to day life and more on expat life in general <s> It covers a range of topics about life and travel in Belgium <s> I have guest posters on different topics from art to technology and I write about many different travel destinations around Europe Blogging opened so many doors for me in the early months of my expat life and continues to today <s> I honestly believe that blogging saved my expat life 
<s> commercialized us <punctuationfreak> How many of us in today is world have time to think just for a second how commercialized the world has become or rather we have become Are v now what we really wanted to be Are we synchronized with what we have studied and what we are doing Let me place myself as an example <s> I have studied electronics and instrumentation but i am sitting for placements for a software company <s> Ok lets say thats what life is <s> But when we know thats what life is then why do we have many other options other than comp science and the IT <punctuationfreak> If what everybody wants is money then yes software is the right field but 10 years from now where would u get ur computers if u r programming down der Who would teach ur children if ur friends are along with u <punctuationfreak> Everybody wants the IITs and IIMs but how many of them work for INDIA <punctuationfreak> Friends just sit back and think where did your journey start what was YOUR goal are u reaching for the one u started ur journey <punctuationfreak> Many of us think our aim is to earn and keep the family happy <s> But how many of us are happy in the process <s> A family always supports what you do if it is right <s> A happy mind is necessary to keep the family happy right Job satisfaction is most important i feel rather than money <s> But very few would agree with me because the world is like that <s> Comp science students no hard feelings <s> This blog is dedicated to all the hardware STUDENTS <s> I would say ENGINEERS coz i dont know how many of us will really work as hardware engineers 
<s> I realized that the best time to start potty training is when the kid is around 5 months old <s> When the head doesn 't need support and the neck is firm <s> At that age they don 't run around and it is easier to put them on the potty <s> You will be able to identify when they want to 'go iso you start putting them on the small potty <s> For my son that is what my mom did - that habit continued and he kind of started knowing that 'If I am put on the potty I must sort-of push ' <s> Now my son is a year old and quite recently I started the habit of taking him to the bathroom and putting him on the regular potty <s> So now he knows to say 'baa ' bathroom when we wants to 'go ' <s> I see that some parents new of course are finding it difficult to potty train kids after they reach the walking age <s> Kids just get used to the diaper and refuse to sit in one place <s> Of course this doesn 't come with the side effects of other isettais ' I think vaguley translates to naughty behavior -These days he loves to go to the bathroom and play with the water <s> So he will make that 'I have to go 'face <s> I tried putting him on the smaller potty - he sat there for 2 seconds and started pointing to the door and he says 'baa ' <s> I took him to the bathroom and he immediately ran to the bucket to play with the water So I am as usual running behind him

<s> My dad works on submarines so I 've been around them here and there and certainly heard about them since I was a little kid <s> I vaguely remember going on a tour of one when I was probably about 9 or 10 <s> Last Christmas my dad took me Gabe on a tour of a sub in Virginia and let me tell you they seem a LOT smaller inside when you 're a grownup But I digress <s> At some point I was talking with my dad about an analytics problem I was working on and describing the process I was using to try to figure something out <s> He told me the tale of the <smiley> Scorpion a sub that went down somewhere in the Pacific and the process the Navy used to locate the sub <s> I was transfixed as he told me about John Craven the mastermind behind the search effort and his use of an old mathematical theory that quantifies the value of hunches <s> They used it to successfully locate the sub More about that soon Anyway that was enough of a motivation to get me to read this book and now I AM OBSESSED WITH SUBMARINES <s> Seriously <s> It is out of control <s> But they 're fascinating The book is full of all true stories of submarines from WWII through the Cold War and it was the first time that a lot of these stories were made public <s> I can 't recommend it enough 
<s> That is Not My Name and That is OK I used to think walking was merely a way to get from point A to point B or to exercise <s> Sometimes both <s> When I am alone I am plugged into my <weirdcaps> <s> When I am with a friend we talk <s> A walk is a walk is a walk until I walked with Claire The girl doesn 't know it but she always knows exactly what to do and say to put things in perspective This morning we decided to walk uptown to the post office and library <s> She put on her Dora sneakers and tan jacket and I surprised her with new purple mittens with hearts and rainbows I bought her on winter clearance <s> This made her very happy I put on my pink backpack loaded with the envelopes that needed to be mailed my phone and some money since I was pretty sure I had library fines to reconcile <s> Claire put on her Dora backpack The weather was lovely sunny and about 40 degrees when we started walking <s> Sidewalks are inconsistent for the first few blocks so we cut down an alley to avoid street traffic <s> As we passed a garage Claire asked 'Where 'd my shadow go ' 'What honey ' I asked She stopped 'My shadow Grammy ' Shadow But of course I haven 't thought about my shadow since I was a kid except to maybe avoid looking at it when I was obese 'It is hi 'en by the garage ' I told her 'Let is move back into the sunshine ' 'There it is It is big ' she said 'You have a big shadow too Grammy ' and she waved 'See my hand ' I waved back with both hands <s> She giggled 'I see your fingers in the shadow ' she said When we turned the corner we were back on a sidewalk and our shadows were in front of us <s> Claire hopped over each crack for the rest of the block thrilled that her shadow kept up with her We got to a corner at which we had to cross a street <s> I was holding her hand and was just going to walk her across when it dawned on me that I could teach her how to properly cross a street 'Always stop before walking out on to the street ' I said 'Look to your left <s> Do you see a car coming ' Looking very concentrated she peered down the street 'No ' she said seriously 'Now look to your right <s> Any cars ' 'Nope ' 'OK that means we can cross safely ' We walked down a street I 've walked for years but I 'd never really noticed that the Purinton is house was blue or the rental next door had green trim until Claire pointed it out <s> Then she spied tiny purple flowers in the next yard ' <repeatedchars> Those are crocuses ' I told her 'Crocheches ' she repeated <s> Close enough I wouldn 't have noticed them on an ordinary walk <s> I notice them in my own yard because I am looking for them but crocuses are even better when you 're not seeking them out and spectacular when you unexpectedly get to introduce them to a 2-year-old who loves the colors purple and green 'I run real fast Grammy ' and she took off <s> I kept up by walking more briskly but it was fun to let her get to the next house a little before I did We were getting close to another <s> Culling In the winter I find myself in a state of retreat like a tree in an inert state of waiting <s> Watching <s> The sun ekes through the windows at the most pitiful angle <s> I push my writing desk right up against the window to try and absorb whatever light is going to be doled out <s> Inspiration trickles in droplets one by one <s> Inertia wanes <s> Daily business unfurls at its slow French city pace across my square <s> It is tempting to passively watch <s> In past years I have always done what it takes to shake things up to keep things from freezing over but it is true <s> Winter has always been hard for me This is my first winter with the baby <s> While I still won 't say everything changed something very big has shifted <s> A lot of time goes into animating teaching comforting and reassuring my little boy <s> I am blowing on coals <s> New coals <s> Hot coals <s> I am constantly moving to stay one step ahead <s> I must explain to him what we plan to do <s> The spontaneity that I used to rely on to shake things up during the winter has been transformed into my breath on these hot coals This week in the kitchen cure I am thinking about optimization which translates to freedom <s> I 'll take it wherever I can get it <s> I am culling equipment from the kitchen and most of all moving things around <s> I have a couple of shelves full of things I rarely use so I am moving these things out and creating new space for the things I should have close by Do you have any equipment on your counter that just takes up real estate I have very little counter space <s> In fact when you count that which is taken up by the grinder the mixer and the kettle I don 't have any at all <s> I have become adept at using cork mats as anchors for cutting boards along the edge of things <s> When I am cooking things that involve more mise en place than simple slicing and chopping on little boards along the way my kitchen moves out to one of the two work tables outside the kitchen Now that the sun is finally beginning to fill the house again It is time to put the pastry table back by the window and move my writing desk to a quiet place in the house <s> This is a very good time for my kitchen cure <s> I need to optimize my kitchen to do away with unnecessary steps <s> Time is more precious now than ever <s> Labels <date> Kitchen Cure by Lucy Vanel 13 50 2 comments 08 MARCH <date> Foraging Thoughts on a Monday This talk about the people on the market who sell their foraged wild herbs got me thinking this weekend <s> It was cold up there and the ground is still frozen solid <s> I spent some cozy time indoors with a piece of tracing paper over a map of the land dreaming about what we might try to accomplish this year in the garden <s> Last year we simply cleared the field by hand and spread mixed wild flower seed and it was very nice <s> We also randomly planted some vegetables around here and there and we were rewarded with some very nice zucchini potatoes and beans While I am thinking about dried herbs and seeds and the ones I loved the most as I replenish my spice drawer I realize that it is the wild ones that get me so excited at the market here in the city <s> One very useful task this summer will be to learn to see more wild herbs and edible plants all around us on country walks and out in the field outside the kitchen door <s> I often catch sight of old women out on steady and slow early morning walks in the hills when it is warm out carrying small baskets <s> This I suppose is the bucolic image that causes the tourists to come and clear everything from sides of the well worn hiking trails <s> But in the little homey places away from the stations the farmland and grazing paths where we can walk all day barely seeing anybody it can 't hurt to cut a sprig here or there Foraging anything takes a bit of method in thoughtfulness <s> For example when out picking herbs have the sense enough to use a field knife and cut them leaving the base in tact <s> Leave the roots and cut only what you need <s> There is no need to rip any plant whole from the ground effectively exterminating it <s> Give it a chance to grow back <s> Last year I did transplant some wild strawberries that spread and grew from their little sheltered spot under the cherry tree <s> But I was careful about it and did it with respect for the path I was walking on <s> Mindful of my intention to nurture this plant as a special project I took the whole plant from a place where thousands more were growing

<s> Beyond Getting There What Travel Days Show <smiley> Today is guest post is by Gillian at One-Giant-Step com sums up for me that imperceptible change that happens when you travel you start appreciating things you never thought you would In that process maybe you even learn a new way to see the world Who is it that said 'It is not about the destination it is about the journey ' Nine months of full time traveling has proven to me that this is absolutely true Before leaving on this trip the thought of an 8 or 10 hour bus trip was pretty daunting <s> The longest trips we 'd taken were on planes where they serve drinks and meals and we can pass the time watching movies <s> Eight hours on a bus without the same amenities sounded like torture but we jumped in right from the start with a 22 hour ride from Lima to Cusco that while not the most comfortable ride got us into the swing of things pretty quickly Once we got a routine down snacks packed books prepared podcasts ready and had determined our favorite seats on the drivers side no window bar blocking the view no children nearby bus journeys became easy and now travel days are some of my favorite days They are a chance for quiet reflection to leave behind what is past to think about the place we are leaving and start thinking about how we will remember our experiences there that great evening we had at the market the interesting people we met at the cooking course the horrible bed at the guesthouse <s> They are a chance to look forward to anticipate what is coming and to plan ahead where will we go next how will we get there where will we stay <s> They are a chance to stare out the window and think about where we 've been and where we 're going about past successes and future plans when else is there a chance to do nothing but quietly think Travel days let us learn a little bit about the people and culture of the places we visit <s> Sitting in an airport bus station or train depot gives me a great vantage point to see how people relate to each other <s> Who is traveling with who Where might they be going and why Are they traveling for work or holiday or to visit family Who are they meeting or leaving behind In a small northern Turkish town we witnessed a heart-wrenching goodbye between two young men <s> Turkish men are very close - it is normal to see them holding hands and embracing each other and this couple seemed heartbroken to be leaving each other <s> One boy sat in the seat ahead of us perhaps on his way to school or military service his friend stood outside the bus <s> They spent their remaining time together with hands pressed against the glass trying to talk through the window and texting each other on their phones <s> I don 't understand Turkish but is was clear they were going to miss each other terribly I like the act of traveling the moving forward the getting somewhere <s> I love watching the scenery slowly change from rolling hills to flat plains along high twisty mountain roads or perfectly straight desert highways there is always lots to see <s> One of my favorite bus rides is still that first 22 hour ride between Lima and Cusco <s> I will always remember dawn breaking over the altiplano the smoke rising from the llama herder shacks and the sun glinting off the frost that covered the ground There are plenty of stories to be told about dodgy bus trips or awful plane rides or the never-ending tuk tuk minivan bus boat combination what would we do without those stories But there are also plenty of journeys that are made perfectly lovely the lemon spritz on Turkish buses the meals served on Argentinean buses or the comfy bed on the overnight Thailand train Travel days are an integral part of travel <s> They are filled with possibility and anticipation of what lies ahead <s> I like the optimism they have the sense that fun and adventure lie ahead <s> No matter how long or short the journey they will always be my favorites 
<s> Neither do i have that deep a knowledge about the game to understand nuances nor am i sharp enough to rattle out how many runs India won the nth match of the xth world cup by <s> This blog is not about that <s> This blog is to say 'Thankyou Sourav 'for making cricket that 'extra special ' <s> I dont know if it would have been the same for me without you <s> Yesterday as I was watching the India - Eng ODIs i felt something strange <s> Its something i have been doin over the last 8 o ' years looking at you on the field changing field placements smiling frowning exalting shirt waving jumping puching yelling scolding and what not and every moment was pure joy <s> I did read somewhere 'Sourav Ganguly pulled at the heartstrings of the masses like no other cricketer had done before 'and I definitely agree <s> Being responsible for the collective mood of a nation over such a long duration - fabulous job done

<s> History waiting to repeat - The family visit to Agra last week was for the benefit of my two young nephews aged 9 and 7 years who had never seen the Taj <s> Strangely the visit for me turned out to be a morose one <s> The Taj did not seem as splendorous as it used to <s> The grandeur of its marble seemed to have been visibly effected presumably by pollution since I last saw it around two and half years ago <s> The badly lit inside was depressing and too claustrophobic <s> The too well known story of 22 <date> craftsmen having their hands cut off upon the orders of the Emperor after the completion of the monument seemed to stain the beauty of the Taj as I looked at it Visit to the Agra Fort was no better <s> How Akbar the so called emperor ' died suspected to have been poisoned by his own ambitious son Jahangir <s> How Jahangir blinded his own son Khusraw a contender for the throne as per Akbar is will <s> Shah Jahan Jahangir is son killed his own brothers to secure the throne and was finally imprisoned by his own son Aurangzeb in this very Agra Fort Listening to the guide giving the tales of treachery deceit barbarism cruelty and ruthless ambition that was played out in these monuments of Moghul historicity I wondered how this land of Vedic culture based on truth and dharma gave way to such lowly culture of killings loot plunder and lust Greed lust cruelty and barbarism reflected in every story told by the guide <s> He showed us the phansi ghar in the basement not open to public so we could just peep in just below the Jahangiri Palace which incidentally was a place for rest and pleasure for the women in the emperor is harem <s> It made me wonder why a phansi ghar was situated inside the living quarters and just below the place where the emperor indulged in pleasures <s> I was then told by the guide that this was the place where the women queens of the harem who fell out in disfavour were tortured and executed Only a Moghul emperor could drink the choicest of wines and enjoy pleasures sitting atop a dungeon where hapless and screaming women were being tortured and tormented Looking down from the Fort we were shown a tank like structure and were curious <s> The guide related the story <s> It was a favourite sport of the members of the royal family <s> Elephants were kept around the tank deprived of water in hot seasons <s> They were drugged to make them thirstier <s> In that state after days of deprivation of water they were led to this tank which was filled with alcohol <s> As they drank the alcohol in that inebriated state of extreme thirst they bloodied each other as the emperor and other royals watched with pleasure This was the culture that invaded the land where Sanatan Dharama was practiced <s> A land where animate and inanimate were revered where birds animals and even rivers mountains were worshipped That Hindu India was prosperous and full of riches has been chronicled by various travellers <s> It was a coveted land <s> One is told of how rubies emeralds sapphires and diamonds were embe 'ed in the walls of the Moghul monuments and mausoleums creating ornate designs <s> Jewels were set into the floors across the vast marble <s> The splendour and wealth of the Moghul courts has been narrated over the years <s> Where did all this wealth come from Obviously plundered and looted from the people of the land <s> Babur the first Moghul was a nomad and obviously did not bring it from his country <s> The wealth was plundered from the temples state treasuries and the peoples of this land <s> It was the wealth of the Hindu land conquered by the invaders given to plunder and loot Even before Muslims came to India there were wars and battles between the Kings <s> There were conquerors and there were the conquered <s> However the wars were mainly fought between the martial classes <s> Strange as it may sound today the Kings and princes observed time honoured conventions that were sanctioned in Shastras <s> For example places of worship were never touched <s> The Brahmins and the learned were not harmed women were not violated and cows were not killed <s> In fact non combatant civil population were never killed or captured as the battles were mostly fought in open spaces <s> The local population was never plundered and war booty was an unknown concept in wars and battles fought then <s> The kings had a code of honour and violating this code was considered reprehensible and kings found it worse than death However Muslim invaders came with a different code <s> They would fall upon unarmed hapless civil population after a victory on the battlefield <s> They would burn down villages and towns after the defending martial warriors had been killed <s> They went in for mass murders of the civil population and Brahmins were their special targets <s> They pillaged and looted even from the bodies of the dead <s> They raped and captured women who were considered a part of the booty <s> Those who were not killed were sold as slaves <s> This was the code of the Muslim invaders code of their Prophet <s> They did it all for their Prophet as holy warriors ' <s> The world famous historian Will Durant has written in his Story of Civilisation that 'the Mohammedan conquest of India was probably the bloodiest story in history ' <s> The Hindus found it very hard to understand the psychology of this new invader which they were witnessing for the first time in history <s> If one were to read the chronicles of those times advent of the Muslims into India became possible only through deceit and treachery and not out of valor or greater prowess Then came the British and the plundering of this hapless people continued and more than ever before <s> It was not a plundering for a short while <s> It lasted for a full <date> years from the battle Plassey in <date> to Independence in <date> <s> So much so that a country which even after being ruled over by the Muslim invaders for so long was considered the 'brightest jewel in the British Crown ' at the beginning of the 20th century India was the poorest country in the world in terms of per capita income After <date> years of attacks against Hinduism India gained Independence but at the cost of partition of the land with hundreds of thousands of Hindus killed and driven out of their homes by Muslim claimants to the North Western part of the country Last 60 years India has tried to regain its self with economic progress on all the fronts <s> Today it is being projected as the 'Superpower ' of tommorrow <s> It has tried to forgive and forget the wounds afflicted since the days of Mohd bin Qasim <s> It has been trying to think of a better future for its people <s> Hindus accepted a large part of Muslim population within even though a separate state Pakistan was carved out as homeland for Muslims <s> They embraced the followers of Christianity which had bled them and ruled over them for over <date> years <s> All because Hindu way of life is inherently tolerant and accepts all diversity with a vision of Vasudaiva Kutumbakam world is one family <s> However it has again become a target of these two monotheistic religions <s> For over a decade now Islamic terrorists have been attacking mainly the Hindu population <s> The objective of the jihadi ' terrorists is to divide India once again on the basis of religion and create what they envision as Mughalistan <s> On the other hand the poor and underprivileged are constantly being targeted by the Christian evangelists converting them to Christianity against lure of money brought in from the affluent West <s> These conversions have assumed alarming proportions in the last couple of years Is history waiting to repeat itself 
<s> I am sure all of you are wondering why I call it 'Hell-Dia ' <s> Frankly I have nothing against the place <s> On the contrary I quite like this quiet place <s> Its not bad at all <s> But when the basic amenities are a problem you fail to see things with rose-tinted glasses <s> After all come on I am human <s> We have adjusted ourselves to this environment and graciously accepted this mundane lifestyle <math> sob <math> and the pathetic food <s> Its not fair enough to blame the place but it would be unfair if I don 't blame TCS UFS HIT and the other umpteen people trying to provide services to us and making money in the process <s> TCS and HIT have struck a high-profit business deal at our cost <s> It is this fact I am unable to digest <s> The fact that TCS is showing step-motherly treatment to the <date> of us at Haldia for no fault of ours is something I can 't swallow <s> We were told that our training is a 35 working-day period but all of a su 'en they say we 'll have to do our stream training here which means we are stuck here until May <s> No confirmed news yet <s> All credit to TCS for their effective and efficient management practices I wonder how people give them awards for good management etc bang forehead <s> Adjustments work only for a short period

<s> If trying to write a grammatically correct sentence in German is a huge feat in itself sentences that are a little more complicated than the ones in German1 or 2 speaking a grammatically correct sentence amidst all the stuttering and stammering is a whole other thing My oral exam is in two weeks that is right Zwei Woche Writing in german is easier because you know the rules and you have time to apply them happily and you can make use of the famous tips they give in class For example while forming questions you know that the verb goes in the beginning of the sentence and so you can write it in assertive first and then change it <s> Like you have a book <s> Du hast ein Buch <s> As a question that becomes Hast du ein Buch I know it seems really simple now but trust me with Praesens Praeteritum Praesens Perfekt Akkusativ Dativ Praepositionen und so weiter es ist schwierig difficult <s> But speaking has to be more spontaneous and there is obviously lesser time to process what you want to say to search for the most appropriate word to check the golden grammar rules <s> Whew Ironically one of the methods to improve your writing and speaking skills apart from practising dialogues Reaktionenubungen etc is by reading and writing more <s> And so as an effort to actually write speak at least 3 correct German sentences in a row I am now blogging in Deutsch or so it seems

<s> After migrating to Singapore and living in a world sans <smiley> if there is one thing I miss about the small screen it is got to be the advertisements My love for Indian ads started out when I was a very small and rather annoying kid <s> I was hyper all the time <s> And I used to play this game called 'Guess the Adu ' with my dad <s> It was pretty simple <s> Basically when an advertisement began we had to guess the brand product before it got announced in the ad and whoever guessed it right first got 1 point <s> The first person to reach 10 points was the winner <s> I used to win all the time of course Truth is my dad would play the game primarily to shut me up <s> Perhaps the fact that I threw tantrums when I lost also had something to do with my successive victories I 've always found advertisements very attractive and fascinating <s> I even surf channels looking for new commercials <s> There are awfully creative ads Saint Gobain types and there are some really stupid silly ones which nevertheless I enjoy laughing at <s> Then there are the oh-so-cute ones like the Hutch puppy and the jingles Titan Airtel Doodh Doodh <s> There are also patriotic Lead India and for-a-cause ads Aaj Tak <s> Ads with megahuge brand ambassadors witty taglines stupid taglines no taglines and periodically changing taglines When I sit and think about old commercials now I noticed I am able to recall the absolutely lame and inane ones as easily as the witty ones <s> For instance I loved 'Illathin yezhil vannam ' the well-known jingle by Nerolac <s> I didn 't really enjoy the one by Nirma 'Washing Powder Nirma ' <s> Yet that is what came to my mind first O

<s> Colors aren 't always the best thing to happen It is often their absence which holds more promises to me <s> Colors with their exuberance and fulfillment are more intoxicating than is the serene sense of being colorless <s> The tangles that colors often tie me in bring about hopes and expectations which I am often not capable to meet <s> The more spectral hues cause higher degrees of trauma to surround me in a state of clinching fear <s> It is a state of crisis I go through on knowing that the absence of colors is no where near <s> Getting routinely habitual hues can be disturbing to a stable mental state of thoughts Religiously being exposed to such luxury is instantly welcomed with open arms <s> But only till that instant when you don 't lose your self to the comfort of not knowing yourself <s> Accepted in the initial stage this unfamiliarity tends to be damaging with gradual effect <s> The only hopes that I then hold are the subtle recovery of my stability to support me enough to know myself further and better <s> And that is where the colorlessness seems more attractive than ever before

understand ' <s> As an outsider I can never imagine one English man to be less logical than another just because he is from down South <s> He had been completely stressed out by the London Tube which was borrowed from a healthy taller person as he was extremely thin <s> He was evidently a little withdrawn from other candidates and had been looking for a job for more than a year now I didn 't get <s> Associates on Partner Track Need a Plan B Big law firms are naming fewer associates to the partner track according to a Business Week article titled Making Partner Less Likely as Big Law Firms Face Cash Crunch The article reports Dewey <weirdcaps> LLP in New York announced it was promoting only six attorneys to equity partner in December down from 20 a year earlier <s> Mayer Brown LLP in Chicago said it promoted 14 attorneys to partner in November down from 27 and Orrick Herrington Sutcliffe LLP in San Francisco announced seven partner promotions this month down from 15 a year ago <s> Revenue at U <s> S firms was forecast to drop as much as 10 percent in <date> according to a survey of <date> firms by Citi Private Bank is law firm group <s> Here are some likely implications Associates will give more thought to hanging out their own shingle after gaining a few years of experience plus the money to offset law school loans Business development skills will play a crucial role in new partner selection Mid-sized firms will benefit from high level associates seeking better working conditions Aggressive associates may move to in-house counsel positions more readily Longer term economic and competitive pressures will continue to push costs down while forcing law firms to increase proficiency in both operations and legal business development <s> Posted by Margaret services in Florida may provide information about the lawyer firm is past results and testimonials on their website ONLY IF they comply with new attorney advertising guidelines scheduled to take effect on July 1 <date> A new 'disclaimer 'page must be a 'ed to sites that want to provide this information <s> Click here for sample disclaimer language for Florida law firm websites We 'll be <s> I wish I had taken a more proactive approach to my son is eating habits <s> Being the first-time new mom I did not know what the right quantity of food that should be given to an infant nor did I know how and when to feed the infant <s> Now after a year and 5 months I realize a few things which I wish I had known earlier <s> These would have helped my son be a better eater and me a more satisfied mom 1 <s> Never force feed your baby even when they are tiny babies <s> That habit must start from the cradle 2 <s> Kids know when they are hungry <s> So force feeding will kill their basic instinct It is very difficult to get back that instinct <s> And they will start developing hatred towards food 3 <s> If you start force feeding during the baby days you will probably end up like me - always running behind your child during meal times <s> I dread meal times Phew It breaks my back 4 <s> Kids are not machines or 'gunny bags 'to eat some standard quantity of food at regular intervals <s> They will have their own pattern <s> We could possibly produce food in front of them every three hours or so and let them eat sitting in one place <s> This pathetic habit of showing some entertainment while eating - SUCKS Don 't even try it 5 <s> This really limits my ability to travel with my son and generally doing other things because a it is hell time consuming b I don 't think I have the energy left to do anything else after a war with my son <s> Phew I wish some day my son and I would break this lousy habit of running around and chasing each other while eating and I wish we would have happier and peaceful mealtimes <s> God help me

<s> My Lentil Weekend I wrote over on Lynn is Weigh yesterday on Facebook come join us over there that when I get a hankering for a particular food I eat it to death over the course of a few weeks then forget about it for awhile <s> This weekend lentils sounded really good so I dug out my favorite lentil soup recipe and tried a new lentil 'burger ' recipe <s> Thought I 'd share them both with you I can 't remember where I got this soup recipe so I apologize to whomever I lifted this from <s> I modified it a bit but it is not originally my recipe Lentil Vegetable Soup Makes 6 2-cup servings 1 large onion chopped <math> cloves garlic chopped 1 t ground cumin 2 t chili powder 3 C veggie broth 1 C dried lentils I sometimes use Ω C of lentils to make it more soupy 1 can <math> 5 oz diced tomatoes undrained fire-roasted is fabulous 1 can 8 oz tomato sauce 1 can 4 5 oz chopped green chilies undrained 1 C frozen corn 2 medium carrots chopped about 2 cups 2 small zucchini diced about 2 cups Spray a 3-quart saucepan with cooking spray and sautÈ onion garlic spices in a little veggie broth until veggies are soft <s> A ' everything else cover and simmer for <date> minutes depending on how soft you like your lentils I modified a lentil meatball recipe that I found through Loser For Life Marisa is blog <s> She originally got from In Jennie is Kitchen <s> I made 8 patties rather than 18 meatballs and I am using them like veggie burgers The original recipe is below with my modifications in parenthesis Lentil Ricotta Meatballs Makes about 18 2 cups cooked lentils pureed I cooked them in vegetable broth rather than plain water 2 large eggs lightly beaten <math> C Egg Beaters <math> cup plain breadcrumbs I ground <math> C regular oatmeal <math> cup fresh ricotta I used low-fat ricotta <math> cup grated Parmesan cheese 1 <math> teaspoon chopped parsley Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste Jennie is cooking instructions A ' all ingredients to a deep bowl <s> Mix very well over medium flame <s> A ' shaped ameatballs ' and cook until browned all around turning only once <s> Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate and let excess drain off <s> A ' to simmering marinara sauce <s> You may be familiar with Moore is Law which dictates that the computing power of a single silicon chip doubles roughly every two years as the transistors upon it get tinkier and tinier <s> You may not be so familiar - mainly because I just made it up - with Garnier is Law <s> Garnier is Law dictates that the names given to mascara products will double in ridiculousness roughly every two years despite the lack of any corresponding technical advance in the product itself <s> Like Moore is Law Garnier is Law has been in force for some years such that we now find ourselves in a world where the names given to mascara have become entirely decoupled from reality <s> Hence Lash Builder a plausible name for a mascara given that the sole function of the product is and always has been to cake your eyelashes in a manner that makes them look slightly thicker and longer gave way in due course to Lash Architect a ridiculous proposition when you think about it

<s> Storm of the century I know that the 'big istorm is old news but we have been in California for two weeks visiting Jared is family another post about that to come and I haven 't gotten a chance to tell our story <s> Thank goodness for all the modern technology that alerts us to the weather with enough warning to prepare <s> Wednesday night we made a trip to Sam is club to stock up on gas and food <s> It wasn 't crazy crowded because this was two days before the storm is supposed to hit <s> My kids had been sick for about a week and Thursday night Ben was up complaining that his ear hurt <s> Friday morning we decide to take them to the Doctor before the storm <s> Snowflakes started to fall as we pulled into the parking lot <s> It was crowded but they saw us and both my kids had ear infections <s> The doctor advised us to keep them inside for a few days <s> Then we had to get their prescriptions filled <s> Every pharmacy within a 10 mile radius had a <math> hour wait on prescriptions people were panicking <s> We came home and Jared went out a little later to get their presciptions are we seeing a pattern He made it home safely <s> Everyone but my youngest brother was home and we just hunkered down for the storm <s> My sister and I had stocked up on some new toys that we pulled out for the occasion <s> Friday all was well <s> We felt like we were prepared <s> I got up early Saturday morning for no apparent reason and my sister was up too <s> She was worried about us losing power <s> Having no electricity might not seem so bad considering that my parents have propane heat but keep in mind that we are on a well here <s> A well with an electric pump <s> No power also means no running water for us <s> She had filled up the bathtub with water and I filled every camel back water bottle that we had we have a lot of them between us all <s> Then we go back to bed <s> After I get up and eat breakfast I start making bread <s> We didn 't buy any bread because I was going to make some <s> Here are the pictures of the dough rising I was preheating the oven to bake my bread when the power went out <s> It was only 10 am <s> According to my husband I was freaking out <s> I was worried about my bread and the fate of us all without bread to eat <s> But I really didn 't need to worry <s> Jared and my brother-in-law dug out the gas grill and the fire pit and cooked that bread I really was impressed <s> It snowed the entire time they were out there cooking the bread <s> The two loaves they cooked on the grill and the three free form loaves they cooked in a dutch oven over a fire they built during a snow storm <s> The gas grill really saved us during the entire weekend <s> For lunch we had leftover lentil soup that they warmed up outside with fresh bread <s> For dinner we grilled up some venison potatoes and veggies <s> It did not feel like we were deprived of anything <s> But it sure gets dark early with no electricity <s> My brother-in-law popped popcorn on the gas grill and we let the kids watch a show on our portable <smiley> player that has a 6 hour battery which was fortunately fully charged <s> Jared had filled up lots of buckets of water and my sister had filled the tub but with 12 people in the house you use a lot of water just flushing toilets <s> By Saturday night our bathroom water supply was almost depleted <s> We still had plenty of drinking water thank goodness <s> My sister went outside and stuck all those empty buckets around the house to catch the water run-off brilliant Sunday morning still no power <s> We used as many paper products as we could to avoid having too many dirty dishes laying around <s> Since it finally stopped snowing the men went outside to assess the damage <s> Numerous trees had fallen including three across our drive way <s> They spent most of Sunday cutting down the trees and shoveling a little bit <s> Once they got the driveway cleared they did some further exploring on our street <s> There are three ways to get to main roads from our house <s> Well a power pole had fallen across the road one way a tree branch had broken off taking down some power lines with it the other direction and the isecret back road 'had a car stuck right in the mi 'le of it <s> No power and no way out we were totally cut off from the outside world <s> The phone stopped working on Sunday <s> Cell phones with no electricity to charge them were our only link to the outside world <s> I have a couple of siblings that live an hour away and they didn 't lose power <s> They offered to rescue us but they couldn 't get to us we would have had to hike about a half mile in 30 inches of snow <s> My two kids have ear infections my parents are in their 70 is not much hope of hiking out <s> Remember that the doctor had told us to keep our kids inside for a few days <s> That was a bit harder than I thought it was going to be <s> My brother grilled chicken and potatoes with some veggies for lunch <s> Sunday night before the kids went to bed we all hung out together in the living room lighted by my dad is two oil lamps <s> My brother played guitar and we all sang while the kids danced around <s> It was a lot of fun and something that only happened because we had nothing else to do <s> Then we put the kids to bed <s> We were all a little disappointed that the power was not back on for the Superbowl for which we had made sandwiches and had chips and dip <s> Then my brother-in-law and my dad rigged up a <smiley> plugged into my mom is Prius <s> And it worked We got to watch the Superbowl I couldn 't believe it <s> But then it was back to darkness <s> Monday morning the kids were getting a little stir crazy <s> My sister dug some toys out of storage that the kids haven 't seen in two years <s> That helped buy us some time <s> After lunch the road was cleared one way we could leave Still no power mind you but a way out <s> My sister called some friends in the ward that live in an apartment complex and she asked if we could all come over and shower at the club house <s> All 12 of us climbed into my sister is 4 wheel drive car that seats eight <s> We dropped my brother and his son off and we headed off to shower <s> We filled up all of our water bottles too <s> Keep in mind that another storm was coming with another predicted <date> inches <s> We went to a grocery store to get us through another storm <s> Then we went to the mall <s> It was almost surreal <s> We had felt so cut off for nearly three days and people were shopping at the mall like it was an ordinary day <s> I really felt like we had just come out of the dark ages <s> Which in a sense we had I guess <s> Then we made it home but we had to hike up the long and steep driveway with all our groceries <s> When we got home the power was back on <s> I was so happy I could go to the bathroom without a flashlight <s> My parents have a very unique house and all the bathrooms are in the center of the house without any windows <s> In other words very dark even in the mi 'le of the day <s> We hit the house with a vengeance we did 3 loads of dishes that night alone and 4 loads of laundry <s> Can I just say that Jared is a survivor I really don 't need to worry with him around <s> My brother-in-law is the same way <s> They really saved the day <s> The story doesn 't end there <s> With another storm looming in the horizon everyone is plans changed <s> Two of my siblings that live an hour away decided to head to Florida <s> Their school district had already cancelled school for the whole week <s> One of them need my brother-in-law to house sit so he was leaving <s> We were leaving for California on Wednesday <s> My dad said that if all his shovelers were leaving he had better go too Tuesday morning they headed to the airport to see if they could get on a flight to Florida <s> At 9 40 am my mom calls from the airport 'Honey the airport is closing after one today do you want to try and get out to CA today 'Yes I think I would <s> She handed her cell phone over to the Southwest agent <s> He was super friendly <s> His name was Eric and this is what he said to me 'I can get you and your family on a flight leaving here at 11 40 am can you make it here by then 'I paused for just a minute before I responded <s> I still had laundry important laundry drying 'Yes we will be there 'Then my mom talked to my sister 'he says you and the kids can fly standby to Florida to you want to come the flight leaves at 10 50 am 'She said 'yes 'too <s> The whirlwind began <s> Bags packing kids getting dressed everyone hiking down the drive way <s> We booked it to the airport as fast as you can book it in that much snow <s> My brother-in-law did a great job of driving us safely there <s> We literally ran through the airport with bags and kids in tow <s> I am not much for spur of the moment traveling but it was an adrenaline high <s> Because the airport was closing in two hours there weren 't many lines and they all let us go to the front of them <s> Very nice We are helping my sister make it to her gate my parents already on the plane <s> My sister is carrying one bag Jared is carrying a bag and a kid <s> I am trying to herd the rest of them to the gate as fast as 4 and 5 year olds can run <s> She makes it to the gate and there is no one there <s> My parents are on the plane sitting on the front row saving her seats <s> The flight attendant prepares to close the door my mom says amy daughter is coming 'The flight attendant tries to tell her that she didn 't make it <s> My sister flagged an attendant and they tell her to just run onto the plane <s> I guess once they close the doors they don 't open them again <s> She made it Then we had a few minutes before our flight took off <s> We barely had enough time to buy some lunch before we had to board the plane <s> But the kids were real troopers and we made it <s> They were so well behaved <s> It was awesome traveling with kids does get easier <s> It took me awhile to come down off that high but it was kind of fun <s> My brother was pretty surprised when he came home tuesday night to an empty house full of food <s> He had to hike the <math> mile because his ride couldn 't make it down the road <s> That is our amazing story of survival <s> I hope you all were well during the storm of the century <s> Former CIA Director Michael V <s> Hayden was fond of saying that when it came to handling high value terror suspects he would play in fair territory but with 'chalk dust on my cleats 'Four legal memos released last week by the Obama Administration make it clear that the referee role in CIA interrogations was played by its medical and psychological personnel According to the U <s> S <s> Department of Justice is Office of Legal Counsel which authored the memos legal approval to use waterboarding sleep deprivation and other abusive techniques pivoted on the existence of a isystem of medical and psychological monitoring 'of interrogations <s> Medical and psychological personnel were the arbiters of torture assigned to monitor interrogations and intervene to ensure that interrogators didn 't cause iserious or permanent harm 'and thus violate the U <s> S <s> Federal statute against torture The reasoning sounds almost circular <s> As one memo from May <date> put it 'The close monitoring of each detainee for any signs that he is at risk of experiencing severe physical pain reinforces the conclusion that the combined use of interrogation techniques is not intended to inflict such pain 'In other words as long as medically trained personnel were present and approved of the techniques being used it was not torture The memos provide official confirmation of both much-reported and previously unknown roles of doctors psychologists physician assistants and other medical personnel with the CIA is Office of Medical Services <s> The government is lawyers characterized these medical roles as isafeguards 'for detainees Medical oversight was present from the beginning of the special interrogation program following the <date> attacks and appears to have grown more formalized over the program is existence <s> The earliest of the four memos from August <date> states that a medical expert with experience in the military is Survival Evasion Resistance Escape <smiley> 'SERE ' training would be present during waterboarding of detainee Abu Zubaydah and would put a stop to procedures 'if deemed medically necessary to prevent severe medical or physical harm to Zubaydah ' All interrogation techniques the memos said were 'imported 'from SERE Later the CIA is Office of Medical Services OMS personnel were involved in 'designing safeguards for and in monitoring implementation of the procedures 'used on other high value detainees <s> In December <date> the OMS produced a set of 'Guidelines on Medical and Psychological Support to Detainee Rendition Interrogation and Detention 'a still-secret document that is heavily quoted from in three legal memos that were written the following year The CIA declined our request to comment further on the OMS is role in detainee treatment <s> The OMS employs physicians psychologists and other medical professionals to care for CIA employees and their families Perhaps the most chilling aspect of the memos is their intimation that medical professionals conducted a form of research on the detainees clearly without their consent 'In order to best inform future medical judgments and recommendations it is important that every application of the waterboard be thoroughly documente 'done memo reads <s> The documentation included not only how long the procedure lasted how much water was used and how it was poured but also 'if the naso- or oropharynx was filled what sort of volume was expelled and how the subject looked between each treatment 'Special instructions were also issued with regard to documenting experience with sleep deprivation and 'regular reporting on medical and psychological experiences with the use of these techniques on detainees 'was required The Nuremberg Code adopted after the horrors of amedical research 'during the Nazi Holocaust requires among other things the consent of subjects and their ability to call a halt to their participation The memos also draw heavily on the advice of psychologists that interrogation techniques would not be expected to cause lasting harm <s> At times this advice sounds contradictory <s> While calling waterboarding amedically acceptable 'the OMS also deemed it 'the most traumatic of the enhanced interrogation techniques 'The fact that traumatic events have the potential to cause long-lasting post-traumatic stress syndrome has been well documented <s> Physicians for Human Rights in interviews with eleven former detainees held in Iraq and Afghanistan found isevere long-term physical and psychological consequences 'All the individuals we evaluated were ultimately released without ever being charge 'dsaid Dr <s> Allen Keller medical director of the Bellevue New York University School of Medicine Program for Survivors of Torture The memos describe the techniques in highly precise and clinical detail befitting a medical textbook <s> During water boarding in which a physician and psychologist were to be present at all times 'the detainee is monitored to ensure that he does not develop respiratory distress <s> If the detainee is not breathing freely after the cloth is removed from his face he is immediately moved to a vertical position in order to clear the water from his mouth nose and nasopharynx 'Side effects including vomiting aspiration and throat spasm that could cut off breathing were each a 'ressed 'In the event of such spasms if necessary the intervening physician would perform a tracheotomy 'While physician assistants could be present when most 'enhanced 'techniques were applie 'duse of the waterboard requires the presence of a physician 'one memo said quoting the OMS Guidelines Doctors were also described as having vetted the practices for safety <s> Certain limits on waterboarding were created 'with extensive input from OMS 'One memo states that OMS 'doctors and psychologists 'confirmed that combining the various techniques 'would not operate in a different manner from the way they do individually so as to cause severe pain 'Medical and psychological personnel were required to observe whenever interrogators came into physical contact with detainees including slapping them and pushing them into flexible walls <smiley> 'walling ' <s> Whenever a detainee was doused with cold water a medical officer had to be on hand to monitor for signs of hypothermia <s> Confining prisoners to cramped boxes required 'continuing consultation between the interrogators and OMS officers 'Prisoners made to stand for long periods to prevent sleep were to carefully monitor detainees for swelling of the legs and other dangerous conditions and at least three times early in the program were switched on medical advice to 'horizontal sleep deprivation 'This was one example of how medical personnel could according to the CIA help prevent isevere physical or mental pain or suffering 'on the part of the detainees <s> However the memos show that the OMS is role was not merely to limit the medical impact of interrogations but also to consult on the effectiveness of interrogations <s> A May 30 <date> memo quotes the OMS suggesting that cramped confinement was 'not particularly effective 'because it provides 'a safe haven offering respite from interrogation 'Monitoring interrogations is a role that the American Medical Association among others has rejected pointing out that the presence of physicians or other medical personnel could paradoxically make interrogations more dangerous <s> As Keller explains it 'The interrogator may think well the health professional will stop me if I go too far <s> The health professional is thinking I am really here at the behest of the CIA <s> There is a tension of dual loyalty 'Just as officials in the Justice Dept now condemn waterboarding as torture so too did opinion change at another organization the American Psychological Association <s> In the frightening days following the <date> attacks 'there were two schools of thoughts in the psychological community <s> One was if you were there on the ground you could do some goo 'dsaid APA spokesperson Rhea Farberman whose organization was criticized for originally taking that position <s> The group is current stance is to forbid psychologists from participating she said 'If you are there on the ground you may be seen as condoning the behavior 'Some medical professionals are calling for colleagues to be investigated and sanctioned <s> But finding out which professionals were involved in designing monitoring and implementing the interrogation techniques may be difficult <s> The four memos were released almost in their entirety <s> The few redactions concerned mainly the names of the personnel involved 
<s> Tomorrow the Special Envoy for Malaria at the United Nations will be announcing a special Social Media Envoy group that will use the power of social media over the next year to raise awareness for malaria control in African countries The special envoy is made up of well-known figures from both the social web and broadcast media including Mashable is own Pete Cashmore <s> Those that have joined the group have pledged to take one isocial ' action such as a tweet or a Facebook Facebook post every month for the next year starting from World Malaria Day on April 25 which last year saw Malaria No More also use Twitter for the cause The hope is that the tweets posts and other social actions will inspire and motivate social media audiences in support of malaria control <s> The UN is goal is to provide all endemic African countries with malaria control interventions by the end of <date> working towards the aim of near-zero deaths from malaria by <date> We 're very happy to see the UN enlist the power of social media in the fight against Malaria <s> The disease kills one million people each year with over <math> of the world is malaria deaths occurring in Sub-Saharan Africa <s> Universal bed net coverage is the UN is chosen prevention tool to fight the diseases it has delivered over <date> million insecticidal mosquito nets since <date> covering nearly <date> million people However there is more money to be raised and more work to be done <s> We hope that the social media envoy will go even farther than their commitment to one social action per month because Malaria is a battle where every little bit helps 
<s> We recently reported child-actor Corey Haim had obtained a large quantity of prescription drugs just prior to his death earlier this week <s> Despite early reports suggesting Haim died of an enlarged heart the coroner is office has stated the final cause of death won 't be available for another six weeks when toxicology reports are completed <s> They have also begun investigating how Haim was able to get access to such powerful medications including Oxycontin Vicodin and Valium <s> According to the NYT one of the prescriptions used to obtain these drugs was a forgery and investigators are looking into a larger issue with drug rings stealing legitimate script pads from doctors and forging prescriptions which are then sold illegally <s> But it goes even further than that <s> Here is what California Attorney General Jerry Brown had to say 'They get prescription drug pads get illegal drugs then sell them on the street <s> You have doctors doing wrong people pretending to be doctors and all the criminal intermediaries making the process work 'Initial police reports into Haim is death stated no illegal or illicit drugs were found in his possession however as we 've learned with high profile cases like Heath Ledger Anna Nicole Smith Michael Jackson and Brittany Murphy prescription drugs used improperly can have just as deadly consequences <s> Haim is agent who also represents his long-time friend Corey Feldman Mark Heaslip said Corey was making great strides to wean himself off of drugs which may have been as many as 50 pills a day He also said the actor had just begun work with an a 'iction specialist <s> In the days leading up to Corey is death he had complained of having trouble breathing and had a fever between 99 and <date> <s> His mother had thought he was fighting off a cold or flu but as it turns out these may have been symptoms of his enlargdheart
