<s> Hi Kristyn I thought this was a really well done blog on sensory integration dysfunction <s> I will pass it on to others <s> I found out last year that my son is very sensory seeking <s> I had never heard of sensory integration concerns before my son started exhibiting signs of this dysfunction and it was a very confusing time for me <s> I wish I had gone on-line and connected with others Currently I am trying to raise awareness about <smiley> through our book I Can Be A Child is Whimsical Introduction to Yoga <s> I have been practicing this book with my son since he was a baby and little did I know that it was a great tool for his sensory concerns <s> A percentage of our proceeds goes to a local nonprofit dedicated to preventing developmental delays through education <s> If you get a moment we also have a blog our website is <repeatedchars> qandjbirdpress com <s> I look forward to reading more of your blogs 
<s> Our special children these bright and creative ADHD children can be such a challenge to parent <s> We watch them bounce around in our neuro-typical world stumbling and falling more than their peers <s> We want to fix it and make it all better as though ADHD is just a boo-boo but it is not and we can 't <s> At some point we come to accept that it can 't be changed <s> We even come to accept ADHD into our lives and our families and focus on the gifts despite ADHD <s> We focus on our children is talents and their accomplishments and love them unconditionally <s> But we worry about their futures too the time when they are no longer under our wing and must learn to soar on their own <s> My son often gives me glimpses of his future and lets me know he is going to be okay <s> Not just okay but great even <s> Quite often these glimpses are hi 'en in the most brief moments of peace and joy <s> These times when I am observing him and I am not worried but content and joyful <s> When he creates something unique says something insightful or achieves something so easy for his peers I can peek into his future and be satisfied <s> That little moment when I realize I am at peace with ADHD 
<s> I wondered whether you may be able to offer some advice <s> I am an Occupational Therapist working for the NHS in Sheffield UK <s> A group of professionals have started to plan an ADHD group for Adults and we are generally involved in developing a service for this client group very little support available currently <s> We are struggling to find information research examples of groups which we can learn from <s> We have a number of ideas including using psychosocial and behavioural interventions and have flirted with the idea of incorporating a sensory integration approach <s> However we are concerned about the little evidence on sensory integration and ADHD <s> My question to you is this Can you point me in the direction of any evidence journal name or particular paper examples of good practise contact name etc for Adult support groups and Sensory Integration <s> If you do I 'll think yer amazing and tell all my colleagues about how wonderful you are <punctuationfreak> Does this encourage you <punctuationfreak> Anyway thanks for the website it is already proved very useful and I look forward to reading the updates Liz 
<s> One of those men was Mark Ri 'ering <s> We barely knew him when he helped us move but that didn 't stop him from eagerly volunteering to help <s> As we got to know him well I have to admit that he sometimes made me feel like I did when I was a little girl and hero-worshiped a heroic policeman <s> Mark Ri 'ering was a good cop <s> He was a true hero <s> He was also one of the sweetest kindest men I 've ever met <s> I loved watching him interact with his kids loved watching how he looked at them how he played with them how he so obviously cherished them and his wife <s> He enjoyed life enjoyed his family enjoyed his many many friends <s> I don 't think I 'll ever forget his smile or his laugh <s> We knew Mark during the time when he began noticing troubling symptoms and when he received the diagnosis of ALS <s> He was an important part of the weekly Bible study that first met in his home and later in ours <s> We all watched him walk through this time of uncertainty <s> If he felt sorry for himself we never knew it <math> his concern was always for his family and that he would be found faithful in God is eyes <s> Over the months and years we watched his big strong body deteriorate <s> Never once did we hear him complain <s> Instead we still heard him laugh and still enjoyed his smiles his loving concern for our family and his sense of humor <s> He encouraged others over and over again 
<s> Showing Improvement Well I 've been on the antibiotics and other meds that my Gastro put me on for over a week now and I am beginning to see progress <s> I still have problems with my tummy but the constant feeling of nausea is gone and good ri 'ance We wrapped all the presents and filled the stockings last night so we 're all ready to enjoy the next few days with our family <s> We 'll all be together this Christmas and that always makes it extra special <s> Some years we have to share our daughter with her in-laws which is only fair but I am glad she and her hubby will be celebrating with us this year <s> We 've had a particularly rewarding Christmas this year already helping a large number of families find replacements for lost or bedraggled lovies for Santa to put under their Christmas trees We 've received wonderfully excited thank you is from many of them and each time one was received it just made this Christmas that much more meaningful <s> It can 't be said often enough that it really is more enjoyable to give than to receive <punctuationfreak> My hope and prayer is that you have a Christ filled Christmas this year too 
<s> According to my psychiatrist SID is a dysfunction disorder under A ' ADHD <s> I found a site about it after researching why I had such sensativity to smell sound and touch <s> The sight calls it Sensory Processing Disorder instead of SID now <s> There are different check list pages to see if you or a loved one might meet the criteria <s> When I did it I was amazed <s> I met almost everything <s> Its very interesting I wondered since I take A ' medication if that could actually make the sensory sensitivity worse <s> I also have PTSD <s> But after 9 years of being misdiagnosed I am happy to be functioning pretty well with the A ' medication <s> As long as I dont let a rebound effect take over I metabalize the stuff fast and that even if it is XR <s> I can also take a Clonazapam to relieve my oversensitivity at those times <s> For me the A ' medication while still activly working in my brain even makes the SID normal <s> All of the meds and diagnosis are tricky and time consuming plus alot of trial and error and if lucky a positive <punctuationfreak> 
<s> I supported it <s> Frankly I never thought I 'd live to see the day when people would try to redefine the institution of marriage and would then try to impose their ideas on others even to the point of forcing all couples getting marriage licenses to have to be identified as 'Party A 'or 'Party B ' rather than as bride and groom <s> When su 'enly marriage has become about something completely different than what it has always been understood to be when it is no longer about a bride and groom but about two 'parties ' well I finally decided enough was enough when it comes to people trying to impose their new definition of marriage on all of society and on our legal system <s> This social experimentation had gone too far <s> Some time back I wrote this Save Marriage <punctuationfreak> Defend Marriage <punctuationfreak> I still think that the greatest threats to marriage come from within marriage itself <s> We are the ones who threaten our own marriages through all manner of sin whether it be just plain selfishness and irresponsibility or lust adultery pornography abuse the list goes on <s> I wish more of us were willing to spend our time money and effort vocally and effectively fighting those very real threats against marriage <s> But in the meantime I helped my son get signs put out <s> I spoke out where and when I could <s> And sometime over the next few weeks I hope to blog about why this issue is so crucial to me and why it should be crucial to you as well and why we need to speak out now 
<s> Well I finally did it I am out of the stock sites <s> As some of you know I have been experimenting with selling my artwork online through half a dozen stock photography and microstock sites for a couple of years <s> While they were generating income the experience has never been ideal <s> Uploading was time-consuming especially with so many sites <s> It was frustrating to have certain sites reject an image for utterly arbitrary reasons while others accepted the very same image <s> And I certainly didn 't enjoy giving away <math> of my income to these companies for the privilege of hosting my art <s> I felt none did a good job of marketing or promoting my work <s> I had already had my own site Fractallicious up and running for about a year functioning primarily as a signpost to direct interested people to the various stock sites and other places such as <weirdcaps> where they could buy my fractal art <s> Fractallicious was successful in that regard but once potential customers landed on one of the stock sites I had sent them to I became a tiny fish in a huge ocean of competitors <s> Income trickled in in dribs and drabs <s> So I set out to be my own stock site <s> Turns out I sadly under-estimated the challenge involved in turning a static web site into a full-blown ecommerce application <s> It is been a long tough slog with numerous technical difficulties but we 're finally there The company we chose Volusion com provides a turnkey ecommerce platform allowing you to create an online store with a powerful database back-end shopping cart and merchant account services <s> The Volusion technology is robust complex and highly configurable <s> Because of this very complexity it is also far from intuitive and comes with a steep learning curve <s> The company scores an A for the superb quality of their <date> technical support <s> So starting this week I have eliminated the mi 'leman And no this is NOT an April Fool is joke I am partnering with my sister on this endeavour and we 're not only selling gorgeous if I say so myself high-quality image downloads but also certain images printed on a variety of merchandise <weirdcaps> <s> My rainbow designs have been very popular with the gay and lesbian community and we 're starting with three of them printed on 1 'buttons and attractively packaged as a three-pack for gift giving <s> Drop by Fractallicious com and have a look <s> If you like what you see please feel free to spread the word 
<s> By A Customer My husband was diagnosed with an extremely severe case of colitis then Crohn is disease <s> All that his doctors were doing were prescribing higher and higher doses of drugs sulfasalazine prednisone etc which were making him sick and caused him to drop pounds daily <s> Then we heard about Elaine Gottschall is book <s> It has literally been a life saver <punctuationfreak> The author provides both an explanation for the diet and a simple guide of 'do eat 'and 'don 't eat 'foods in list form <s> My husband felt like he had his symptoms under control within two days He was able to stop taking his medications with no complications <s> At last no more stomachaches <s> After two years of being on this diet my husband has shown remarkable improvement after follow up tests <s> However don 't expect your doctors to support this diet they don 't want to give up their hold on prescribing expensive prescription drugs Even more unbelievable the specialists we 've seen are completely ignorant of this book Incredible <s> This diet is completely natural and relatively easy to follow especially considering the alternatives Buy this book for yourself or for your loved one who suffers from this disease <s> It can change lives <s> We cannot thank Elaine Gottschall enough 
<s> Most people have heard about the holiday blues but not many have heard of the holiday flares <s> For those of us with rheumatoid arthritis this time of year can be the beginning of very painful season <s> There are many contributing factors to why you may experience a flare during the holidays bad eating stress and depression just to name a few <s> Your RA symptoms may increase due to these factors and can make what should be a great holiday into a flare to remember <s> The fact is we can not always control our symptoms but we can make choices to help avoid the pitfalls of pain <s> The most important tip that I can give you is to slow down <s> There are a million things to do and not enough time to do them <s> So keep it simple <s> Your house doesn 't have to look like a Christmas museum in order to feel festive 
<s> Yesterday was the last day of winter break <s> Our two boys had some gift certificates to spend at a local book store <s> When my husband and I saw I Don 't Want to Go to School written and illustrated by Stephanie Blake we had to get it <s> I didn 't read the book first and now regret buying it because it is really too young for us <s> The hero Simon seems to be a kindergartner who is afraid to go to school <s> The guy we were thinking of is eleven and in the fourth grade <s> Also unlike the hero my guy has autism and his problems with school go way beyond anxiety He just doesn 't like it and we 're still trying to figure out why Anyway by the end of the story Simon decides he likes school so much he doesn 't want to leave <s> That is great but it makes me wish that was the case with my child <s> He always wants to come home <punctuationfreak> Don 't get me wrong <s> The book is cute <s> My six year old liked it a lot when I read it to him though it seemed a bit young even for him let alone my eleven year old <s> I also noticed something a bit off about the book <s> It is a picky point but Blake depicts Simon writing his name in cursive on one of the pages <s> This is something a second or third grader might do but certainly not a kindergartner on his first day at school Further there are signs all over the kindergarten room on one page in the book <s> All the signs written in cursive <s> I 've been in many a kindergarten room and usually all the signs are printed <s> So that is another thing my son does not have in common with Simon <s> He might not ever write in cursive <s> It is hard enough for him to print his name <s> C1 is team at school and I think his problems with school might have to do with writing <s> My team and I learned about how to solve writing related problems at START <s> Hopefully I 'll blog about the topic of hand writing soon <s> As far as this book goes it seems most appropriate for young children who are just about to enter primary school though I like Wemberly Worried a similar book by Kevin Henkes a bit better <s> Blake is pictures are bright and cheerful and the story depicts Simon having a lot of fun at school but as a mom of older children I wish I had passed on this one for something more age appropriate 
<s> That is what he would call himself <s> When I met him online he was pastoring a tiny little church in some little Texas town <s> But he was one of the smartest men I know with a mind that would never forget anything <s> The first few things I found out about him is that he loved Jesus loved his family loved teaching had a special place in his heart for mothers and babies and was hilarously funny <s> Eventually I found out he had put together a lengthy series of lessons from the Bible dealing with a certain topic in a way that infuriated me scared me and then set me free from a lifestyle and church that was sucking my soul -- and the souls of my family -- dry <s> It sounds trite and corny but this man changed my life <s> Sometimes I 'd tease him that he ruined my life <s> I 'd say 'Here I was happily living a life of crushing rules and regulations that I kept failing at until you came along and ruined my life with all your talk of grace freedom and joy 'I only met him once in person but it was one of those unforgettable visits that our family still talks about over a decade later <s> He and his wife became 'Uncle Mike and Aunt Marilyn 'to our family <s> We fell in love with their adorable baby boy <s> We spent a lot of time talking and laughing <s> They felt like long lost family <s> Just a little bit ago I got the news 'Mike has been promoted to Heaven 'I can 't help but think that Jesus greeted him with the words 'Well done my good and faithful servant <s> Enter now into the joy of your rest 
<s> I have been losing chunks of memories <s> I have been experiencing it much too much lately and so I went to see a psychiatrist who told me that achalasia or my anemia could be part of it <s> He told me to see my primary care physician and ask him to recommend a neurologist <s> I am going to do it <s> I have an appointment to go see my Doc this afternoon <s> In the meantime I did some research and here is what I found <s> Read the entire article <s> Warning You may need a medical dictionary to decipher some of the article <s> The following quote is just a very small bit <s> But it is important to read the whole thing and maybe one of you readers can tell me what you got out of it <s> Maybe I misunderstood it 'The corollary to this is that loss of argyrophilcells may have the same clinical effect as totalneuronal fall-out 
<s> At my school the kids get 20 minutes for lunch which is bell-to-bell time <s> So lunch time includes waiting in line getting your items finding a seat opening your food packages EATING throwing out your trash and lining up to go back to class <s> If they don 't finish it all they have to throw it away <s> Taking food back to the classroom is not allowed <s> I think kids get about <date> minutes to eat maximum if everything goes as planned <s> If their class is the last to get into line well they might have as little as 5 minutes sitting at the table <s> Well it just doesn 't seem like enough time to eat <s> It is hard enough for the teachers to grab a bite in 20 minutes <s> After taking the kids to the cafeteria getting my meal together using the microwave chatting with a teacher and using the bathroom I might have about five minutes to eat <s> Also the food prepared in the school cafeteria is very often meant to be eaten by hand <s> So that is pretty easy to do in <date> minutes <s> It can 't be utensil-friendly fare if you only get a spork <s> I personally can wolf down food when necessary but I am an adult <s> Imagine a little person who maybe eats a little more slowly than an adult <s> Do they actually eat very much in 5 minutes I guess my wish is that all kids get 30 minutes to eat <s> Lunch is about learning too it is not just filling an empty stomach and sometimes they don 't even have a chance to do that <s> Lunch is a break for students to chat with their friends in an informal setting <s> Learn about foods and enjoy eating 
<s> When you and your spouse are first exploring whether or not ADHD has been a factor in your marriage it can seem both a relief finally a reason that explains so much and a bit overwhelming ADHD seems to be everywhere Some with ADHD resist thinking about how much ADHD can impact their relationship because it makes them feel 'broken 'or lessened <s> I asked myself the other day - does it matter if you label it ADHD The answer to that question is yes and no <s> Knowing about ADHD really helps you find the optimal way to improve your life <s> But you don 't have to 'label 'it ADHD in your everyday life <s> Here is an example For years my husband and I laughed because he is a man who needs to exercise pretty much every day else he can be cranky unhappy disconnected and hard to live with and also doesn 't sleep as well <s> We now realize that this is related to his ADHD and that exercise is one of his forms of 'treatment ' <s> But does it matter that we now know that it is ADHD related Not really as long as he is exercising <s> It is just HIM and one of the things that is part of him with an excellent side benefit for me in that he is in great shape What does matter is that you ADHD or not get a chance to put your life in order in a way that satisfies you and brings you joy Note I say YOU here <s> No one is obliged to satisfy anyone else For those with ADHD who are travelling a journey to find out what brings them joy the label of ADHD is useful insomuch as when you know you have ADHD then you also know that using specific tactics that are shown to work for people with ADHD is the fastest best way to get to your goal - and sometimes the only way given how ADHD works <s> I always remind people - don 't try harder try differently - and by that I mean try those things that are known to work for ADHD because they will work better for you than other approaces simply because of the way you are wired <s> While it once completely controlled my life and my husband is life ADHD is now almost non-existent in both of our lives and certainly in our marriage <s> You can 't imagine how much better things can will get for you if you are able to think clearly and non-judgmentally about ADHD and what is already known about dealing with it And for those with a learned fear of failure having faith that good treatment means you don 't have to continue to wonder whether you 'll fail at what you try is also helpful but that is a different post ADHD is only a curse if you fight the idea of having it more than you fight to subdue it is symptoms <s> Once you subdue the symptoms then you can start to understand the great things that it offers you as well <s> For some those things include minds that move quickly and isee 'things in unique ways tenacity my husband is a good case of this an ability to love well and forgive quickly because they live in the moment almost unending curiosity the list is very long indeed <s> There is a reason why the only guy for me has ADHD Everybody else is just too boring 
<s> Today is menu Pepperoni pizza milk baby carrots multi-grain apple mini-crisps fruit cup <s> Our first repeat meal I strongly dislike the pizza so for me this one was a rough <s> I got excited by the amini-crisps 'because I thought they might be dehydrated apple slices but unfortunately they were rice cake-like disks <s> I liked the baby carrots but I asked one of my students if he ate them and he told me 'No 'The fruit cup was partially frozen <s> I did attempt to eat it <s> NOTE The second picture is a decent shot of the mini rice cakes <s> Also you can see the pizza in the background <s> It is got a glassy film on top which is called cheese <s> The cheese has separated into two layers the isaran wrap 'layer and then the under layer <s> Yum 
<s> Disneyland for little D is a mixed bag <s> He loves the rides but some of it can be a bit overwhelming <s> From the 6 hour drive to his problems adapting to his new bed it is a mixed bag for my little one <s> Overall he had loads of fun though and we came through another good experience together as a family <s> If you do decide to try doing this <s> Here are some tips I think you will find useful I guess these probably work for any multi-day amusement park outing Before you go think about how your kid is going to sleep <s> Something that has worked for us is to bring his bedroom fan and the be 'ing from his bed his own pillowcase etc Bring his diagnosis with you and stop by Guest Services to get a special needs pass particularly if your little one has trouble with large crowds of people or standing in lines for a long time <s> This is a must and boon for the whole family - it makes the park a completely different experience for everyone and it can help family interactions since it instantly makes him very popular amongst siblings since he has the pass and can skip lines with his party Think about the sensory conditions of the place vis-a-vis your kid <s> If sensitivity to sound is a problem lights proprioceptive input etcetera and try to match his her temperament with the conditions of the ride <s> If your kid has never gone into any rides before you may want to take him on something that is outdoors and low-key first this type of ride can also help to relax him afterwards <s> For example a favorite 'relaxing ' ride of my son is Heimlich is Chew Chew train on California Adventure which is the Bugs Life character made into a train and goes outdoors inside a giant collection of food - the odors of the different foods watermelon animal crackers permeate the air as the train goes Keep close guard on him if he is a runner <s> A crowded mega-park is not the place you want to lose track of your kid particularly if he is nonverbal <s> Consider using tags or something else with your cell phone on it <s> If you don 't have anything even black marker on his or her belly <smiley> 'If lost call <math> <date> ' is better than nothing Consider your kids ' limited diet <s> You can bring food into Disneyland Find quiet areas of the park as you walk and pick those places to take a break <s> Take out the food at those times <s> Also keep track of the nearest bathroom Something I noticed and I wished I had done was have lunch in the Tiki Room <s> Little D loved the room it relaxes him to watch the birds and hear the music and once even fell asleep inside <s> You are allowed to eat in there as long as you pick up after yourself which is great to keep fidgetiness to a minimum <s> Because there really is no bad seat you can stay outside away from the crowd until the appropriate time comes you may want to let the attendant know how many are in your party and that you will be doing this and then just show up <s> Or if your kid will allow it enjoy the mini-show in the courtyard Take some video but not too much that you don 't interact with your kid <s> Your kid smiling and his eye contact will be priceless to remember

<s> I went to the doctor today <s> I have gained one pound in two months <s> But keep in mind that I am no angel outside of work <s> For example we just had Valentine is Day and I ate a lot some chocolates <s> I also want to let you know that in December I did have blood taken I did a sugar fast and the basic stats were run <s> At that time I was normal <s> I did have low HDL the good cholesterol but my overall cholesterol is fantastic <s> Why did I do that Well I have awesome insurance that gives healthy adults a yearly discount if I get a physical and basic blood work done thereby proving my health status <s> I love the policy because it is common sense <s> Plus it is a great way to discover a problem before it turns into something <s> Preventative versus reactive <s> It is way cheaper to give discounts up front than pay for a major problem five years down the road <s> When those tests were run I hadn 't even fully come up with the idea of the blog so it is really fortuitous <s> Whenever this project ends I 'll be able to compare pre- and post-data <s> That being said I haven 't been feeling myself recently <s> I am having more stomachaches and that is why I visited the doctor <s> I am looking into it and I 'll keep you updated

<s> Doing Great I am really feeling good these days <s> My stomach is behaving itself and I am encouraged by the strength that is returning to my legs <s> I was able to manage a couple of fairly steep driveways on our yard sale haunts on our Date Day without using the cane <s> That is quite a victory for me as I can 't remember how many years it is been since that was true <s> I am gradually a 'ing back in all the supplements I was taking before my stomach got ulcerated again and so far there is been no stomach problems <s> That is a true blessing <s> I am also encouraged by my ability to learn about the new programming language that our new sites are written in <s> It is slow going but I am gradually understanding how the code is working <s> I am very proud of that <s> I am still going to sleep most nights at 9 00PM and getting up around 5 00AM so I am getting plenty of sleep <s> I usually only wake up once in the night to make a bathroom trip so my bla 'er is behaving too <s> I am getting closer to my goal of losing 50 pounds by April 1 <s> I may not hit the date exactly but I am not going to miss it by much <s> With the lowered rate and the care hubby takes with his grocery shopping my blood glucose numbers have been mostly excellent for some time now <s> Of course there is the occasional high number but I usually know what I 've eaten to cause it and learn accordingly <s> All in all I 'd say I am in the best physical and mental state I 've been in for years and I hope it continues 
<s> Thalassemia is another disease that has the heterozygote advantage <s> This disease is very similar to sickle-cell and it also prevents malaria in heterozygotes <s> This disease is caused by a mutation and it causes the body to have fewer red blood cells than normal and less hemoglobin <s> This disease can be deadly at an early age but in the case of a heterozygote it can be left untreated have blood transfusions needed or just eating healthy <s> Sickle-cell is found in people of African ancestry while thalassemia is mostly in people with Italian Greek Mi 'le Eastern southern Asian and African ancestry 
<s> I am always pushing for the reduction of the stigma surrounding mental illness <s> It may be my error to think that we have made progress <s> What I infer from this article is that universities have regressed when it comes to social acceptance of mental illness <s> This is something that began prior to the horrifying Virgina Tech massacre <s> Read the article to learn the extremes that are being taken against those that are mentally ill <s> With statistics like one in four Americans diagnosed with a mental illness the number requires more mental health support <s> There are too many people that are not seeking the help they need <s> The response to the health problem the universities are making for anyone let alone a huge number of the population are insufficient <s> There is a quote in this article from a politician Rep <s> Garnet Coleman D-Houston who is open about his mental illness <s> I can only hope those voices in important places like his and those of the entertainment industry like Patty Duke and Carrie Fisher will continue to speak and unveil the misconceptions <s> I can only hope

<s> It is a while since my last post and that is partly because I didn 't have a great deal to say and partly because I was busy trying to get my life in order <s> I now feel as though I am making some progress <s> I mentioned previously that I had been medically retired from my job and at the age of 53 that wasn 't really in my plans <s> Aside from anything else I 've always been a very busy person and I felt as though my days didn 't have much of a purpose <s> I had lunch with my former work colleagues last week and that was my 'leaving do ' <s> It was lovely to see them and they gave me gifts and cards with lots of lovely messages which made me cry but then it finally felt as though that chapter of my life had closed and that I can move on <s> So I have applied to the local CAB to do some voluntary work and things have moved really quickly - I have an interview there on Wednesday so fingers crossed I have also re- started learning Spanish - I began last summer but got distracted and now I am trying to make up for lost time it is great because I really feel as though I am making progress this time around <s> I am also wanting to take up a new hobby <s> I used to do lots of cross-stitch but my hands won 't allow me to do that any more so I am thinking of trying crochet which is not such fine work <s> So we 'll see how that goes <s> All in all I feel much more positive about things 
<s> Shaun White is 23 years-old now but only 11 in that clip same age as my daughter <s> And AND he was born with a heart defect that required two open-heart surgeries before he turned one <s> Despite that inauspicious beginning he started snowboarding when he was six won his second gold medal in these Vancouver Games and is the acknowledged master of the sport <s> Ever watch him compete With the other snowboarders both his own American teammates and the riders from other countries there is sometimes a stiffness in their routines a nervous quality that comes across even on television <s> Incredible athletes all and snowboarding tricks in general demand an uncommon kind of bravery and audacity of movement but Shaun White is fluidity almost makes them look wooden in comparison <s> When he goes on he appears to be just playing <s> His performance is all 'Hey guys gonna have a little fun here now k ' as he bounces around the halfpipe and in the tradition of all athletes at the top of their game makes it look easy

<s> So I am coming out <s> I am not plus-sized but any stretch of the imagination <s> I am one of those women that amommy bloggers 'love to hate right this moment at the age of almost 52 I am wearing junior size 5 jeans <s> This is 12 years after giving birth to the last of my six children <s> I doubt that any of my three readers will gush 'Now I love you even more 'but I refuse to be ashamed of my size <s> Not any more <s> I am a real woman <s> I think that carrying six children to term and breastfeeding them for over a year each -- and having them thrive on the milk my 'inadequate 'body produced -- more than qualifies me for real woman status no matter what curves I may be lacking <s> I do not apologize for not being plus-sized nor do I apologize for not even wanting to be plus-sized <s> Sigh <s> I know <s> I am supposed to be worried that my words might be construed as being isize-ist 'and 'intolerant ' and completely lacking in 'fat acceptance ' <s> I should instead be an 'advocate for plus-sized women ' <s> I should drop my head in shame and apologize to people 'I can 't help it that I am thin <s> Really <s> I eat twice as much as you but I can 't gain weight no matter how hard I try 'But you know what That is simply not true <s> The truth is I exercise <s> Not fanatically not three hours each day not even consistently as much as I should to maintain the best health e g the recommended 30 minutes of cardiovascular exercise each day plus strength training to maintain muscle mass and healthy bones at my age <s> Most days I don 't overindulge my appetite <s> I don 't bake as a hobby and don 't consume frequent desserts <s> The type of food I have grown to enjoy the most is relatively low fat and free of rich creamy sauces 
<s> Do women really have more severe arthritis than men Are we more open or honest when answering questionnaires Or are we just more likely to complain Those are the questions raised for me by a research study published in the January issue of Arthritis Research and Therapy and the many subsequent news articles written this week <s> It is long been known that more women develop RA than men in fact <math> of people with RA are women <s> Other gender differences have also been noted <s> Both men and women have relatively equal disease activity number of joints affected damage to joint structure and deformities <s> However while men generally have a higher incidence of rheumatoid nodules higher mortality rates and are more likely to be RF positive women generally are more likely to have RA have more severe symptoms higher erythrocyte sedimentation ESR rates and report greater rates of functional disability and work disability <s> Other studies have found that men are more likely to have periods of remission <s> Men have also been shown to have higher response rates to biologic drugs but on the other hand they also have higher rates of adverse events and serious infections with those drugs

<s> Mrs <s> Clinton I work in health care and see many places where we can improve our system and still provide care for everyone <s> The first line of care should be the primary care physician PCP <s> There are not enough doctors going into primary care to provide adequate care <s> The PCPs we have are overworked and overbooked <s> I worked as a case manager in the emergency department of a major trauma center and medical school <s> We cater to many of our non-funded patients and the number of ED visits would be greatly reduced if PCPs were available to everyone <s> If people could get a same day or next day visit or at least be able to contact their PCP by e-mail

<s> Are you going on a trip to a particular place for the first-time Will you be setting foot in a foreign and unfamiliar soil This blog site is created for you <s> I have been to many places and the first time I stepped into unfamiliar territory I had to feel my way and rely on what I have on-hand especially when all I had were travel books maps and print-outs from the web <s> My friends and I make our own itinerary <s> It is truly advisable to check out anything about the place before going on a trip <s> Yet you need not necessarily hire a travel agent or tour guide to get you around every time you visit a place for the first time <s> A little help from locals can a ' spice to your first-time travels <s> It can give you the freedom to explore the place and enjoy the feeling of not spending much based on my own travel experiences <s> You can take my word on some tips and information on the places I visited but feel free to be creative and be adventurous <s> I may offer some advice here and there but as they say 'experience is the best teacher ' <s> So read on and find out more about my first-time travel adventures 
<s> Sahuayo was affected by the Cristero War of <date> - <date> <s> The Cristero War was the most significant relapse to violence and conflict after <date> <s> It arose from the clergy and traditionalist groups protesting the anti-Catholic policies of the Constitution <s> The Constitution sought to secularise the country and limit the power of the church <s> The Constitution prohibited the chucrh from aquiring land banned monastic orders and church-run schools and forbad any religious activity outside View of the Santuary of Guadalupe of churches now the property of the government

<s> Post note Little bunny died about three hours after I brought him in house <s> I am sure the stress was just too much for him <s> He seemed to be picking up some speed at one point <s> It is all for the better <s> He was warm and cared for <s> I found a wounded bunny near a hay pile I was moving by the lamb stalls this morning <s> He had tucked himself into the safest spot he could and squeaked when I was near by <s> His hind leg has a puncture wound through to the bone <s> He is alive but I 've had my Dr <s> Quinn episodes with bunnies wildlife doesn 't fare well with human interference even when well intended <s> I imagine a cat got him <s> I iodined it after saline bath <s> He is more alert than when I found him and I have him at my desk safe from puppies and wandering felines <s> Not sure if he will make it <s> He 'll die attended though although the sounds of the dogs playing is probably not helping <s> He is calm when held <s> The wandering array of life continues as does pending death <s> These little episodes are not meant to distress but to remind us of the bigger picture <s> Life is temporary and can be snapped away in a bite by man or beast <s> The conflict of having compassion for but raising livestock to sustain me the conflict of helping a bunny that eats my food intertwined <s> Lilly had her lambs last night <s> She finally started labor around six p m and we came to the barn a few times to find her still in pre labor <s> This early morning we arrived to find lambs two beauties <s> The male is very large and already eating a little grass this usually doesn 't happen for a few days or more The girl is this wonderful strawberry blonde <s> Sadly on my second trip to the barn she had torn her eyelid on a piece of the lambing pen - I treated with saline and antibiotic and think it will heal fine <s> Lilly is one of our work horse sheep - always calm and stoic <s> She is a big girl who throws strong lambs <s> I was concerned she had held out this long as we never have lambs past <date> and of course my over active imagination drummed up all sorts of possibilities <s> I tortured myself by re-reading my sheep books about possible causes and lay in bed last night with visions of Lilly lying in breach birth trauma but I guess Mlle <s> Nature just wasn 't ready to pop those two out and they arrived very mature - with ears already standing by morning <s> Normally I wait at least one day to put mom and lambs out but it is sunny and warm and Lilly is an old pro <s> It is less stressful than being separated from the flock <s> They develop so much faster - I find - when they can go outside <s> I want to thank all the nice thoughts people held for us this season- I have to say I feel like a boulder has been lifted off my chest <s> The trauma of last year really made a mark on me and Martyn and it showed this season <s> We lost the stillborn girl and I still fret about the surviving twin is rattle but all in all we are pleased <s> And relieved <s> As the last ewe to lamb Lilly rests and waits <s> And one of Audrey is boys catches some sunny <repeatedchars> is <s> On what most likely was a chilly March 10th in <date> in a hospital room at St <s> Mary is in Rochester Minnesota I came bolting into the world at precisely 10 18 PM <s> And so begins the story which over the years has reached mythical proportions- how I almost killed my mother on my birthday <s> Perhaps it is one reason I chose to never have children - my own mother terrified the heck out of me with my own birth story <s> In all seriousness my mother did almost bleed to death and I have this scar she likes to point out on my forehead from the momentous occasion <s> Supposedly my father looked pale and upset when he saw me because I was pink and red and lobster like where as my brother came out a year earlier looking like JFK - seriously for years my mother compared my brother is looks to JFK <s> I was compared to a lobster <s> And hours before I barged out of the womb my father had been called to the morgue where his 57 year old mother lay dead of a heart attack diabetes related <s> Her untimely death led me to receive her name Katherine instead of Bridgette which my mother had picked out <s> I cant imagine being named Bridgette although as a child I liked to tell this story since Bridgette Bardot was all the rage and as a chubby little redhead I thought BB was quite the cat is pajamas <s> So I can only imagine the yin and yang and surreal quality of that cold March night for my father <s> I wonder if there were things that brought it all back to him as he aged <s> Did the sound of heels on a linoleum floor late at night bring back a sensation of the events he dealt with that night As I get older 52 years older to be exact I can understand how this moment is burned into my mother or father in some kind of post traumatic stress way <s> But being true Minnesotans we carried on and every year my mother made me one of my favorite layer cakes- at the time it was white cake with pink butter frosting <s> In time my tastes changed to German chocolate or her white cake with chocolate frosting <s> I still have the same recipe cards she hand wrote so many years ago all spotted with vanilla stains <s> While I appreciate that I was born I am not one of the people out there saying that birth is beautiful <s> In fact I couldn 't disagree more <s> It is an intimate moment of a mother creature being out of control of her body <s> Miraculous yes but not beautiful <s> I get just about as much birth as I need on the farm thank you very much and all the blood after birth and vaginal prolapses that come with it <s> I think birth is traumatic terrifying bloody and completely chaotic <s> It is a mess <s> In fact it makes no sense <s> A creature pushed out of a keyhole - that is not beautiful it is bizarre <s> It is a miracle but it is not beautiful <s> But it is the only way to get a foot in the door isn 't it Staying in a womb all your life would be safe and warm and inexpensive - no taxes no maniacs on the radio shouting at you <s> But there would be no grand entrance no kisses no pie made with the first strawberries no front row seats to Neil Young <s> No puppies <s> No showers on a hot day <s> No hand to hold when a father dies and no little mouths to feed when a mother dies <s> No matter what creatures come into your life mothering is the beautiful part of birth <s> That some one would go through that trauma to give another creature a way to get their foot in the door of this big messy place called life <s> The winds have come in it is bone chilling <s> All day I was carried back to a place I liked to hide when I was little a grove of sumac bushes out behind our house <s> Alone I felt protected but spooked at the same time <s> Rushing back to the house I 'd hear the wind blowing buckets and roof tops and it felt scary like the Wizard of Oz <s> But home was warm there was homemade cake even on my non birthday <s> It wasn 't messy <s> It is like that today - the sounds of the barn roof rattling in the wind are spooky but I feel safe in the barn surrounded by my mothering ewes <s> Together with my flock I experienced the trauma of last year is lambing and just like my mother did after my birth I carry that trauma with me in a little surface wound in danger of getting reopened if I bump it just right <s> I realized it is my very own birth story and it is required if one expects to find a sense of place in this messy world <s> March 10 Post Note Daisy presented my with two healthy lambs this morning a perfect way to start my birthday <s> They 've made it 8 hours we 'll hope they do well tonight <s> They appear okay <s> I saw some tail wiggling while at the u 'er asign they are getting milk <s> When I saw these pictures I was quite amused at their expressions <s> Amazing how they adapt <s> We are grateful for the sun and warmer weather to help our lambing week along <s> These are Fern is lambs now one week old <s> We had hoped more of the girls would lamb this weekend - perfect weather <s> I knew everyone of the 5 ewes was ready to pop but I like to keep them up and atom until they really go down into labor <s> The new mothers can surprise you though - I once had a new mom wa 'ling casually back to the barn with her baby half way out <s> So last night I was pretty sure Nelly Moser would lamb <s> And she did <s> I have been somewhat concerned about what type of mother Nelly would be- of all our sheep she is somewhat flighty <s> Arriving at the barn there she was with two fresh lambs probably born around 8 am <s> But she wasn 't caring to them very proficiently- she wasn 't licking them or chortling much <s> One was quite dopey looking and chilled not a good sign <s> I checked her u 'er and she had milk and both ram lambs did suck on my finger another good sign <s> I opted not to tube them a procedure where you insert a stomach tube and force feed and gave him milk from my finger instead <s> I decided to take them outside since it is sunny and much warmer outside than the cool barn <s> Nelly was just a bit clueless but she is adapting <s> She is chortling more and can get them to the u 'er but she is not as good as the pros at helping them 'get it ' <s> She did not dry them off well either and I had to step in and help <s> Within a half hour I had them warmed up thanks to the towel and the sun <s> We will just have to watch them and see <s> In the last 3 hours I think both mother and lambs are adjusting to the newness of everything <s> And the other girls wait here is Lilly who I am sure will go soon <s> In fact they are all showing signs of pending labor <s> The rules of this game are simple wait watch then run with all your heart to where ever the guy in front of you runs 
<s> Great track workout <math> mile slow jog a bunch of drills high knees lunges killer long jump things etc Then we did a mile on the track sprinting on the straight parts amp walking on the curves <s> Invigorating Then a <math> mile cool down jog <s> Then one of the other girls and I did a mile jog--really nice way to wrap up an early morning workout Kind of stinks that w the time change the whole 5 <date> 45 workout was in the dark It still AMAZES me that at the end of the workout I can do a mile slow jog and talk the whole way through <s> I mean my heart rate is still going up and my lungs get a workout but it is pretty easy <s> That is just crazy <s> And awesome <s> Total was 3 miles plus the drills <s> We were out there about an hour <date> miles 36 minutes 11 00 pace <s> Okay it wasn 't a good pace but boy was it a GREAT run <s> I focused on going slow and was able to think more about lengthening my stride <s> I a 'ed a little speed at the end but if I hadn 't done that I felt like I could have run for at least 10 more minutes <s> Maybe my easiest run ever <s> But still a good workout <s> I am liking this slow jogging thing <smiley> Wow Not the greatest energy today my speed The trainer doing our Tuesday track sessions gave me advice on how to train for my April 4 10K <s> Here is the plan Week 1 this week Track training 33 minute run <date> minute runs Week 2 Track training 36 minute run <date> minute runs Week 3 Track training 40 minute run <date> minute runs Week 4 Track training 44 minute run <date> to 49 minute runs So the idea is to increase my distance by <math> per week and to run the whole way no matter how slow I need to go <s> That way I 've got the endurance to run most and maybe even all of the 10K <s> Running the whole way would be amazing but I am not putting too much pressure on myself <s> That would be about 20 minutes longer than my longest training run <s> We 'll see how much energy motivation and adrenaline I have on race <s> We did some more ringing in the garden this morning <s> When Derek arrived it was raining steadily and we didn 't think we 'd be able to get any nets up at all <s> After a cup of coffee things brightened up and we put up one 40 ' net <s> We stood in the kitchen and watched birds flying over under and round the side of the net <s> It was pretty dispiriting Eventually we caught two Blue Tits and a Great Tit simultaneously and then it got windy <s> So things weren 't looking too good <s> Fortunately despite the wind and occasional drizzle we did OK <s> We caught two Reed Buntings we 've had as many as 15 in the garden at the same time this week which was pretty good <s> This one is a male <s> The pale flecks on his head will soon wear away revealing smart plain black feathers underneath <s> For a while it looked likely that the Reed Buntings would be the highlight of the morning <s> Then we caught this bird A Great Tit you say <s> Not very interesting surely <s> Well the thing about this Great Tit is that it already had a ring and it wasn 't one that we 'd put on <s> So it is come from somewhere else <s> In itself that is interesting enough we 'll have to wait to find out where it was ringed <s> The extra-interesting thing was that the ring was a size larger than normal - a B ring AAs are the smallest for things like Goldcrests and Willow Warblers then As and Bs are usually for birds like Greenfinches <s> When young Great Tits are ringed in the nest as chicks or pulli as ringers like to refer to them they need the next ring size up <s> This is because their legs are actually fatter while they 're developing The ring still fits OK now that the bird is a thinner-legged adult but hopefully the person who ringed it will be really pleased to hear that one of their pulli has made it to adulthood <s> The reason that Great Tits have such huge families up to 9 eggs is because many of them - <math> on average - will die in their first year

<s> Almost a year ago today I was told I had less than a year to live <s> After two months of deteriorating health unsure diagnosis wrong diagnosis is different medications and a mind full of questionable thoughts I was told what I feared the most <s> I didn 't cry that day or the next <s> I accepted my fate and I remember just trying to show everyone in my life that it was okay <s> I came to really realize what the meaning everything in life happens for a reason ' truly meant <s> I figured that there was nothing but hard times to come and honestly I was okay with that <s> This past year has been difficult in many different aspects <s> I 've watched my family and loved ones cry with tears of sorrow and tears of joy <s> I 've had breathing tubes put in and taken out <s> I 've struggled with learning to walk again and being able to hear my own voice after four weeks of being unable to speak <s> I know that the ups and downs I faced last summer are never going to even compare to the things I am going to encounter in the future because nothing was that difficult <s> If I were to experience this again I would accept it as I did the first time around <s> Despite the hardships that came with what happened I was surrounded by loved ones every single day <s> And if things were to happen differently if things were to be worse then that would be fine because I can 't change what is already going to happen <s> The only things I can change are my attitude about it and make the most out of what was to come <s> To be honest I never thought I would have had such a great turnaround <s> I remember thinking in the hospital that there wasn 't anything I could do but when things started to look better when I was still able to lift my left hand up when I was starting to regain a little strength I knew I couldn 't waste it <s> I knew that I had to keep trying keep fighting and keep doing my best to get past whatever it was that was holding me back <s> Even to this day despite multiple doctors ' visits MRIs cardio appointments etc the doctors are still unsure of what exactly happened to me <s> They think it is an isolated case a onetime occurrence but they said they couldn 't say that for certain <s> All I know is that without the love and support of the people around me the people I don 't know the amazing hospital staff at Children is <math> is the age limit there Aha I wouldn 't be where I am today <s> You all made me keep fighting you all gave me the strength I needed to push myself your support kept me from giving up in the moments where that is all I wanted to do <s> So thank you for your thoughts for your prayers and for just showing me love in the time where I needed it the most <s> And I hope that you all know I appreciate everything you 've all done and I care about each and every one of you even if I don 't know you or we don 't speak anymore <s> I wish you all the best and I will keep doing my best to make a difference in this world and to show you all that your thoughts weren 't wasted <s> Hi everyone I haven 't updated this blog much lately on account of there isn 't any news for me to share with you all in regards to my health plus I update my personal blog <s> Other than the good news of my life has returned to normal and whatever in my brain has been shrinking there isn 't much for me to a ' <s> I have a math final tommorow and this quarter is pretty much over and done with <s> Also been working around 4 days a week <s> Been saving up money for my big trip <s> I thought you might all want to see the MRI is I had done these are just two <s> My first one ever taken and the circled red area is actually the inflammation what I shall refer to it as its ' really big that is why the doctors were so insistant that it was a tumor <s> This was taken in June of <date> <s> This second picture is a different angle and the circled area is the spot what is left of the inflammation <s> It is pretty much smaller than a pea which is great news <s> This picture was taken October <date> <s> A very big change in <math> months <s> I just wanted to say thank yuo all again for everything and for keeping me in your prayers <s> Also I cut off about <math> inches of my hair yesterday so here is what I look like as of right now Maybe I should upload a video of me doing a strenous exercise or something to show you guys my progress First of all I feel exteremy lucky and blessed to able to share good no great news with you all <s> It is almost as if I 've been given another chance to make the most out of my life <s> God has blessed me with great people and a challenge that I am overcoming <s> Today I went to Childrens to get the results of my MRI from last week <s> The neurologist told me that they still don 't have a clear idea of what it is or what made it occur <s> The tests they sent out over the summer with my blood etc all came back negative normal <s> So that is a pretty good sign <s> Then she showed me pictures of my brain <s> She showed me the original MRI picture from back in August which showed a very large white spot in my medula and then she showed me the picture from last week is MRI and the white spot seems to almost be gone now <s> Which means that my brain is getting back to normal the color and it is only got a very little spot of gray white left <s> So everything is getting better and they want to keep me on surveilance for awhile <s> My next MRI is going to be in January before my trip and then after that I only need to get an MRI every 6 months so things are going good Also on another note I recently came into news in regards to some people that I do not know <s> And it is really sad because sometimes its so hard to believe that some people are so unhappy to the point where they need to end their own lives <s> I know people suffer and people hurt but I just wish people didn 't hurt to that point that extent <s> Life is so precious and we 're all only given one <s> Maybe someone had a bad day maybe someone had a lot of bad days maybe it was just a fluke <s> I don 't know what I do know is that we all have the power to make other people feel better about their situations whether it be by offering a smile giving wave being courteous or even holding a door <s> We all have the power to do something and to brighten someones day so we should <s> Why let people suffer quietly Why let people harbor pain Why let people think that no one cares when we do This whole sitaution has changed my outlook on life and the values of family and friends <s> There is never a moment now where I don 't want to do something for other people and it is not because oh 'I should ' it is because I want to <s> And I hope you all want to bring happiness to others even if you don 't know them <s> Sometimes all they need is one person to show them that things can be okay and that strangers care <s> You 've all shown me you care and for that I am eternaly thankful without it I don 't know where I would be <s> For the past two or so weeks I 've been having headaches they 're not bad headaches nor do they hurt <s> They 're just annoying and on the same side of my head every time <s> So my follow up MRI and Neurology appointment isn 't until November 17 and 18 however I saw my doctor on Tuesday and she made a call and I had an MRI this morning at 7 15 <s> Which was very early especially for me <s> I had to leave at 6 am But the MRI went well and I am just waiting to hear from Neurology in regards to how the scan my brain looks <s> I hope that things continue to improve for me and apart of me knows things will things always get better <s> But if they don 't then that is okay too becasue everything happens for a reason <s> I am not scared or worried in regards to any of this business going on I am just trying to make the most out of everything in my life at this point <s> School is not bad but doing a full load online sure is not that fun I started working again too 4 days a week it is not bad either <s> I need something to keep me busy <s> My friends have been great hanging out treating me like I am normal again <s> Which I 'd like to think I am other than the fact that I have to take heart medication <s> I feel like things are normal for me again and I feel my old life habits resurfacing <s> Althoguh some are difficult to ignore others aren 't <s> I still am striving towrads a better life etc <s> And today I realzied what one of my possible careers is will be <s> I have a few but this one I really want to see out <s> I 'll update once I get the results of my MRI <s> Thank you for checking this blog and for praying for me <s> I cannot stress enough how much I appreciate everything you have all done for me <s> The world needs more people like this <s> Also dont ' forget to vote Hey all Some news for you finally an update I had a cardiology appointment a week or two ago and they said that basically I am giong to have to stasy on my heart medication <s> I had a few episodes when I was in the hospital where my heart would beat up to <date> bpm <s> So anyway my heart still does a fast beat sometimes out of nowhere but not anywhere near as bad almost like i went for a run and its beating trying to slow down <s> I had a followup appointment wtih the whole rehab team today and basically i am doing really good my strength is come back
