<s> A 'ed in a couple of items to the Tiny Lifestyle Changes today <s> One I 've been doing for a while and it is working well for me <s> The other is a suggestion made by my associate rector Matt and it is the kind of thing that would work for me if I did it regularly so I am going to make the attempt to do that too <s> The one that I am already doing is from my pastoral counselor <s> He suggested that to handle stress and anxiety since it was keeping me awake at night I should turn over to God the things that were bothering me most <s> He suggested a journal but I am just doing it in prayer <s> I 've been negligent of my prayer life so this is a good way to get back in the habit of talking to God <s> When I was a new believer I used to fall asleep reading his word <s> I sort of miss that comfort and I hope this tiny step will lead me back to that or at least to more consideration in the quiet of the evening when I am lying there trying to shut down my day <s> Last Sunday Matt gave a really good sermon on that included 2 midrash <s> That is may not be spelled correctly and it is not the plural form <s> He told us during the sermon but I didn 't get that bit down <s> One of the midrash talked about the space between the lines of text in the Torah being the place where the true meaning was to be found <s> Then he talked about the name of God as it is in Hebrew YHVH which is never spoken and what the sound might be if we did try to pronounce it <s> Without the vowels that Christians have a 'ed in it sounds sort of like breathy sounds that one hears <s> The PH sound the H sound maybe some of the S those where you are exhaling strongly <s> I kind of laughed when he first did that and tried to say it without the vowels <s> It sounded like a bit from Harry Potter <s> Then as his lesson continued I came to think the breath sound might represent the breath of life that God gives us or that energy which was sent forth from God when he made the world <s> If that is what we find in the quiet spaces maybe it is a good idea that I go back and reread my priests ' sermons so that I can reflect on their teachings and gain what is between the lines of text <s> And that is the second item I a 'ed into Tiny Lifestyle Changes <s> Peace Hope amp Joy If you 've read my blog a lot in the past you know I like to think back on things and see what effect they 've had on my life <s> This is a skill I learned late in life <s> It was something I had to do for some college classes and believe I am much the better for having gained it <s> The process was called reflection <s> Reflection has given me lots of awareness on how things affect others too <s> When I was a child I didn 't spend time analyzing other people is actions or emotions until it affected me and then it was usually a frenzy of trying to look at why they did or said whatever it was that had hurt me so badly <s> That is not socially helpful but it let me express my angst till I 'd owned it and come to a better understanding of the situation <s> Thankfully I 've grown some since those anxious teenage years <s> These days I try to understand the other person is needs or behaviors based on what I know of them and not how I feel <s> It helps a bunch because I 've come to love harmony in my life a gift from Mom and hopefully that longing for peace and harmony makes me more of a peacemaker than an irritant to any situation I run into <s> This morning I was reading an article from <weirdcaps> that talked about a study researching the effects of darkness on people is behavior <s> It said that when the room is darkened not lightless but dim light or people wore sunglasses they might behave in a less ethical manner <s> I found that very interesting and su 'enly I was imagining what I might say to a child who wanted to wear sunglasses all the time because he 'thought it made him look cool ' because another kid he knew wore them and he thought that kid was cool <s> I guess our teachers were right you shouldn 't wear sunglasses all the time <s> Since the eyes are windows to our heart and mind if someone feels you can 't see what he is thinking or feeling he feels anonymous and can thus act in ways that might not be right but won 't be attributed to him because of that self perceived anonymity <s> I think I can understand how a kid might want to be anonymous if he is constantly being corrected for things he does <s> We probably all experience times like that as adults too <s> But knowing this means it is important to look people in the eyes to really know them that it can 't be done by just hearing their words without knowing the emotions behind them or maybe the experiences that have generated their response to a situation <s> That is not always easy to know even when you do look someone in the eye but it gives you the opportunity to ask them for more so that they can express themselves and feel heard <s> I think that is called active listening today and we all know how much we want to be heard when we are struggling <s> I want to go back to that darkness article and think up some more ways that it can affect us so I guess I 'll find a friend I can discuss that with or maybe my counselor since he is good at role play too <s> If you read the article on darkness and come up with any insights I hope you 'll share them <s> Peace Hope amp Joy It is true I am almost gi 'y I am so happy <s> This isn 't because of anything that is happened <s> No major event triggered this <s> I think it is the result of some small changes I made in my routine recently that have just triggered a good feeling within my spirit <s> The changes I made were very small <s> I 've been dealing with depression ever since my marriage broke up in 99 <s> I have a good counselor and maybe a very smart psychiatrist who prescribes my medication <s> So for the past 3 days I 've been on a very small dose of Bupropion <s> Just <date> mg a day extended release <s> This dose is small enough to not cause that edgy feeling that this drug is known for but it helps lift my spirits <s> I think it is taking effect <s> But I don 't think that alone has triggered this surfeit of happiness <s> The next change I made was last night is routine <s> It was cold in the apartment so I took out time in the mi 'le of the evening to draw and take a warm bath <s> I washed my hair and when I was through I put on comfy clothes and went to bed at my usual time hair still wet but combed <s> When I woke up this morning I had more time in my routine to do stuff I wanted to do instead of feeling the need to get ready for work <s> My hair was dry and fluffy call that wash and sleep <s> LOL More time gives you a relaxed feeling about your day so that is going to become a more regular change I think <s> Bath at night and ready faster in the morning <s> Plus I think I slept better for that <s> Good sleep gives me a much better mood <s> Then I elected to dress comfortably for work <s> I work in a business casual environment and some of my coworkers wear suits <s> I would have loved jeans today but it is not jeans day so I pulled out an old pair of loose fitting pants that still looked good and topped them with one of those thin flannel shirts that gives you lots of room to move <s> A 'ed a belt and I am ready for for anything and can move comfortably without care to whether I am sitting like a proper lady and feeling cu 'led in that flannel <s> I think that finished the mood lift <s> So clean rested comfortable and ready to face the day <s> I attribute some of this to the Happiness Project <s> And I am going to continue to read that blog because I keep finding good suggestions in it that lift my mood <s> Hope your day goes as good as I anticipate mine will <s> Peace Hope amp Joy Even though they 'd been sniffing noses through the screen door and seemed interested in being friends when I adopted Hooboo rescuing him from his istray porch kitty ' status he and Hyram developed an instant competition <s> They fought Hyram stole Hooboo is food Hooboo would steal the wrap around my ankles time and they 'd rarely share a bed together <s> Hyram actually kept watch for Hooboo is arrival and left when he entered the room <s> That is until recently <s> I don 't know what changed but for the past two nights I 've had both cats on the bed <s> Sunday night it was one on either side of me <s> Last night they were actually sharing the comforter and less than a foot apart <s> Dare I hope that I 've now got a cat family In other news I am fighting a cold and it is taking its usual course <s> Following a nurse friend is advice I was trying to 'let it run through me ' and avoiding decongestants until the need for sleep precluded that and I gave in <s> Prayers for health are appreciated <s> Peace Hope amp Joy Recently I updated to the latest greatest version of Firefox that being version 3 6 <s> It immediately disabled IE Tab and one or two other extensions a k a a '-ons <s> Oops I 'd been using IE Tab to see my blog because I thought there had been a problem with Firefox and Blogger <s> I 'd been losing the right hand column of my blog in Firefox and IE Tab was my current workaround <s> Then last night I opened and read Sandi is blog and heard her playlist which she has on the right side same as I do and wondered why I could hear her blog and not mine <s> So I started researching <s> The first thing I did was email Terry to see if he had any advice <s> He took a look with 4 different browsers no less and had no problems with my blog so he suggested I clear the cache <s> That is Blogger is usual advice too so I tried it but it didn 't help <s> Then I got a clever idea <s> Why not try disabling a '-ons to see if any of them were the problem <s> Wow what I discovered would make almost 2 posts <s> First off I had way too many Java Consoles installed <s> Apparently when you update Java it doesn 't overwrite the old console but just a is a new one on <s> I am down to just the latest Java Console and the Java Quick Start a '-on <s> That works fine so no problem there <s> Then I disabled everything else and restarted the browser <s> My blog showed fully and the playlist I 'd been missing played beautifully <s> So I started enabling a '-ons one at a time and found the culprit <s> It was Ad Block Plus <s> That is a sweet a '-on and I am going to miss it because I hate ads being stuck willy nilly all over the pages I am viewing and this baby took care of that <s> But lately it seems to be messing with Java and Flash content so I guess I am better off without <s> Then I googled 'Firefox a '-ons that cause problems with blogger ' and got this fantastic page by Mozilla <s> It lists the extensions that cause problems what they mess up and gives a workaround <s> How helpful of them to put that up <s> It was even dated as recent as December 10 <date> so it is very current <s> Yes Adblock and Adblock Plus were on the list <s> It also told me why my browser sometimes gave a message of Firefox is still running when I 'd shut it down and then tried to restart it <s> That little snafu was thanks to Cooliris which is another neat a '-on but I can do without too <s> So that is gone now too <s> Now my a '-on list is much pared down and I am happy with the way the browser is working again <s> I hope that link helps if you are having any problems with Firefox <s> Peace Hope amp Joy It is raining this morning and in a 'ition to the loving behavior of my younger cat Hooboo making bread on my shoulder before settling down on top of me to await my arousal I woke to thinking about blogging <s> It is been more than a month since I wrote anything and I apologize to all of you who 've been checking in from time to time <s> I titled this the 'Season of Bloglessness ' because I am not the only one who hasn 't been blogging lately <s> My friend Susan just posted after an absence of over two weeks and my good friend Sandi has been absent from blog land for almost as long <s> I 'll let you read Susan is blog to find out what she is been up to <s> Sandi on the other hand is very busy with a no longer empty nest <s> Her son Wallace has moved back in <s> I 'll let Sandi tell you the story but you need to know that her life is doing all kinds of adjusting right now so if you read her blog please take the time to drop by and give her support <s> I know she means to get back to blogging sometime soon but her computer is in what is now Wallace is bedroom <s> My job is going well <s> I love what I am doing and the people I am working with <s> Thank you for being so faithful <s> I 'll try to write again soon with pictures of the Christmas Poinsettias I was gifted with <s> Blessings for now <s> Life got rather busy a few weeks ago <s> I mentioned in an earlier post that the Census had called and asked me to work for them again <s> The job kept getting postponed for a couple of weeks and that frustrated me some at the time <s> But the work finally started and it is still as much fun as it was earlier this year <s> The slow spell of the summer is over and we are gearing up to hire a lot of folk for the upcoming census taking <s> If you want a temporary job that pays fairly well and helps your government put resources where they are needed most then click here <s> One of the nice things I like about this job is there is so much to learn about the project <s> I am a perpetual student and excel in learning environments <s> This one has a lot to teach me <s> The fact that we do a Census every 10 years is dictated by law <s> I believe it is written into the Constitution <s> There is a deadline for it <s> The Census totals need to be on President Obama is desk on a specific date in the mi 'le of next December <s> The goal is to do a better job of counting every person in the country than they did in past decades <s> We are aiming for <date> That <date> percent isn 't just those of us who live in houses or apartments <s> It includes trailer parks too <s> That I could have figured out <s> But for some reason I hadn 't figured on them counting campground dwellers boat owners who live in them on the water and people in care facilities like hospitals retirement communities and jails <s> And then there are the people who live in shelters under bridges and overpasses and in boxes <s> Yep we plan on counting them too <s> That thought brings to mind an old black and white movie image of hoboes around a campfire <s> I wonder if they will search railroad cars for people <s> That is the main news on my front <s> I am busy and feeling good about it <s> Yay Other news is that my list of friends on Facebook has grown <s> A bit of that is thanks to Classmates com <s> I am reconnected with a few folks in my high school graduating class <s> That is kind of neat and I 'll probably try to go to a reunion when they hold it <s> On a more interactive front an old college chum got in touch with me the same way <s> I 'd not heard from Harry in something close to 30 years but we were great friends when we attended the same college <s> He is doing well and is in town for the holidays to see his Mum <s> We are meeting for lunch tomorrow <s> I wonder what we will talk about <s> My Dad sent me a box full of pictures from the family collection <s> He is scanning them into his computer and was just going to toss them so I asked if I could have them instead <s> Yeah I love a digital image and can look at one for hours if it is really good <s> But just like books a real photograph printed on paper is somehow more tangible and generates strong memories and emotions <s> Guess I am just an old fashioned girl when it comes to some things <s> I guess the last bit of news is that tonight I am attending a Celtic Christmas Concert at my church <s> The music I 'll hear is going to be performed by Jeff Johnson Brian Dunning and Wendy Goodwin <s> I hope to come away with a CD or two of their music <s> If you want to listen to some clips of their stuff the website is here <s> I 'll try to write about the concert and my impressions later this week <s> Peace Hope amp Joy Wednesday evening is practice night for my church choir of which I 've been a member for about a year <s> These days we are gearing up for the annual Lessons amp Carols service <s> It is exciting because there are always lots of new numbers to sing and it is the choir showcase service <s> We are also thinking ahead to Christmas Eve service which also has lots of music in it <s> Our choir director asked if any of us would be interested in doing some group numbers not exactly solos but still out front and I said count me in <s> So this Christmas I may be part of a trio singing a medley of carols <s> When choir practice was over we had a birthday celebration for anyone who is birthday is in November and those we 'd missed earlier in the year <s> This is renewing an old tradition among our group that fell into disuse and I think we are all happy to have it back again <s> Everybody should have their special day <s> The members who volunteered to sponsor this month is celebration brought wine desserts and some nice crackers chips and dips <s> It was all good <s> Then we left for the evening <s> Outside our sanctuary door there is a motion activated security light <s> It is dark earlier these days so I was glad that it came on as I headed out to my car <s> But apparently someone in the world wasn 't so happy <s> As I passed the tree on the corner of the building I heard a sound I 'd never heard before <s> It was a sort of hooting <s> I stopped and listened and it happened again and again <s> It was an owl protesting about light disturbing his peace <s> In all my life I can 't remember ever having heard an owl before but I recognized it immediately <s> Perhaps there is no other bird that sounds like that <s> Maybe it is so distinctive that once you 've been told what an owl sounds like you can 't mistake that sound for any other bird <s> The moment made me feel very good <s> To know that nature was out there and active that a bird I tend to think of as a wilderness creature was on our church grounds made me aware of how special our sanctuary and grounds are <s> Whenever I am on our campus I feel blessed <s> There is this feeling that just seems to fill the grounds up not just the sanctuary <s> We call ourselves reconcilers and I think that sound served to remind me that we reconcile ourselves to nature too <s> The Happiness Project had an interesting post the other day about de-cluttering <s> It was rules to not follow <s> In it Gretchen gave Eleven Myths of De-cluttering along with how we should not follow those old beliefs and why <s> I was surprised to find these out and have to admit that I am guilty of believing and practicing many of them <s> Maybe I can try out these new methods and get better results <s> What do you think Are you guilty of any of these <s> When the Brisbane Roar had finished their practice session we decided to go over to see if we could meet some players <s> Geraldo was particularly interested in meeting some Brazilian players who were on the team <s> Most of the players had gone into the change room by the time we had walked over from the other side of the stadium but we were lucky enough to meet a couple of the Brazilian players who were talking to the coach <s> I told them that Geraldo was a top ranking soccer player in his hometown in Vanuatu and they were very friendly and were happy for us to take some snaps <s> The coach whose name was Kenny seemed very interested in Geraldo and he suggested I call his friend David a soccer coach at the Academy of Sport to see if he could include Geraldo in some training sessions before he went back to Vanuatu which was a week away <s> He said there was another Ni-Van boy who was in the training squad there <s> Wow we couldn 't believe our luck We managed to get another photo of Geraldo with a gorgeous Aussie player before we left <s> We drove over to Ballymore Stadium which wasn 't too far and found out the Brisbane Roar did their soccer training at 9 30am in the morning so we all came back the next day to see them practice <s> Geraldo was very excited and watched them intensely <s> We decided that since Geraldo was such a keen soccer player that we should take him for a visit to the Suncorp Stadium where the big soccer games are played <s> The stadium itself was locked up but we could see into it from the stadium shop <s> Of course the stadiums in Vanuatu don 't look like this The fellas who were serving in the shop were very friendly and when we told them that Geraldo was a soccer player from Vanuatu they suggested we take him to another stadium called Ballymore where the Brisbane Roar Brisbane is top soccer team practised <s> On the way home on the <weirdcaps> Geraldo was in high spirits <s> He was really enjoying his stay with us in Brisbane Our next excursion with Geraldo was to take him to the cinema <s> Geraldo had watched plenty of DVDs but had never been to a cinema before as there aren 't any in Vanuatu <s> We chose to take him to a 3D screening of Avatar at South Bank which pretty much blew his mind <s> For the best view of Brisbane we drove Geraldo up to the Mt Cootha lookout <s> There are wonderful views of the city and surrounding areas <s> You can see as far as the Glass House Mountains to the North the Gold Coast Hinterland to the South and Moreton and Stradbroke Islands to the East <s> As usual he was pretty knocked out We actually managed to spot our house through binoculars <s> After our bike run we decided to take Geraldo to Kangaroo Point to check out the views <s> Kangaroo Point is situated on top of a cliff which is now the major rock climbing attraction for Brisbane is abseilers <s> Geraldo was pretty keen on the view <s> Geraldo was really overwhelmed by South Bank <s> He just kept saying 'Oh Man <punctuationfreak> 'He just loved the man made swimming beach <s> The beach consists of a beautiful clear fresh water lagoon with views over the Brisbane River to the city <s> Surrounding landscape consists of white sandy beaches bubbling creeks and shady tropical gardens <s> He couldn 't believe the children is water playground either which I have to admit is pretty cool

Stars because you only had seven breakfast tacos about twelve hours ago and you have blisters lining the bottom of your feet <s> These are questions and scenarios that will arise this week during SXSW <s> Don 't be unprepared Follow my survival guide list below and you 're sure to have a worth-while and healthy SXSW experience 1 The Fanny Pack - Fuck purses <s> Who said these ever went out of style WHO TELL ME I recommend the American Apparel shiny denim fanny pack in royal blue because it is awe-inspiring <s> Look at it <s> LOOK AT IT Pretty 2 A Pair of Tom is Shoes - Never mind <s> These hipster staples are like having a thin layer of burlap separating you from the ground <s> I can 't believe they 're donated to a child every time a pair is sold <s> The next generation is going to grow up all jacked with arthritis -this statement is in jest <s> Tom is is a great company that does a lot of wonderful things 3 Cheap Brightly Colored Wayfarers - Because in a way we 're all still stuck in <date> aren 't we 4 Cardigan - Texas weather is known to be a fickle one so make sure to carry around a cardigan with you for night or when it spontaneously rains though the precipitation level is 0 <s> Also throwing on a cardigan over any shitty ol ' outfit will su 'enly make you look more intelligent than you actually are 5 Clean Underwear - 'Cause Lord only knows what you 're going to do with your current pair of underwear 6 Scrunchies - Ladies you make fun of them but you know you secretly love them <s> Who is going to hold back your hair when you 're puking up all that free Hornito is in the Beauty Bar toliet Not that DJ with the florescent bike cap <s> He is been eyeing the girl with the non-prescription horn-rimmed glasses that are over-taking her face all night <s> 9 Granola Bars - The nice thing about Austin is that we 're not a bunch of assholes that bump up the price of everything while you 're visiting <s> However your eating times might be off and in order to not get wasted by 4PM it is worth carrying some snacks around with you Dear Lord <s> I sound like my mother 10 Water- Blah blah blah boring 11 1 is - For when you wander off alone to the strip club Because by the end of the night your mouth is going to look like that of a crusty crack a 'ict 14 Condoms 15 Diana Camera - To commemorate the night you get shit-faced with Bill Murray or corner David Byrne up against a wall and explain to him how you two were always meant to be together in lo-fi <s> Not that long ago I received an email from an Austin-based musician very eloquently sharing with me the day he realized he was a hipster <s> His words were poignant describing his realization as though he was su 'enly inflicted with an incurable disease- Hipstermystalacosis <s> I related to his story and I think you will too <s> When I was thirteen and running around in suspenders and non-prescription eyeglasses I knew there was a name for me <s> For years I fought the label but gave up my denial of being a hipster when I christened the name of my blog Hipstercrite <s> Now when someone calls me a hipster I shake my head in agreement <s> I am a hipster and probably always will be <s> Hipsters stand up tall Unite Dear Lauren I 've been an admirer of your page for a few months <s> I was linked through ' <weirdcaps> 'a music blog run by an acquaintance of mine <s> Like you I am dangerously preoccupied with hipsterism and spend a good deal of my day confronting the issue <s> The reason I am mailing is because I think I represent an interesting case study a person caught in the paralyzing fear of his latent hipsterism and shocked into his true identity by a harrowing event <s> Here is my account I was riding my bike down Duval and the sun was out <s> At this point I believed firmly in my individuality <s> Of course my handlebar wrap matched my brake housing and the same with the metal cages that held my water bottles all were red <s> I wore purple shoes and no helmet <s> The memory of a triumphant sexual encounter arose quickly then left <s> I was pleased with my performance and didn 't dwell on the details didn 't analyze a thing <s> I only recalled the sensations and sounds that make good sex memorable <s> The day was warm <s> Readjusting my fingers on bar I found them to be quite cool I hadn 't begun to sweat <s> The best part of the ride <s> In the first few seconds of what would be the minute and a half that changed my life I didn 't recognize the origin of the rumble growing closer rapidly becoming a roar like the slow onset of a far off thunderclap <s> The sound came from the twin tail pipes of a Chevy Diesel truck <s> Su 'enly they were upon me <s> As I turned down a steep hill near 51st and Lamar I was forced against the curb <s> The huge wheels of the truck kicked up dust and rocks and I was struck by a few of them <s> A large white male leaned out of the passenger window ejecting a thimble-full of spit across the front of my shirt <s> A beer bottle whizzed over my head <s> I felt like a frightened Russian Hussar riding against Napoleon holding out my hand as if to protect myself from the zip of bullets and the whistle of passing artillery <s> At this point about a foot separated my handle-bars and the side of the truck <s> After a few more terrifying seconds the truck sped up quickly finishing the descent and pulling into a parking lot at the bottom of the hill <s> I knew what they had in mind <s> But remember I was not some pussy hipster <s> I was not androgynous <s> I was a man <s> That archaic sense of honor strengthened me <s> Four men stepped out the type of men who buy their groceries at the county feed store <s> They came at me from thirty yards away not running but at a kind of a trot like this was a leisure activity <s> I lept off of my bike and approached them in the mi 'le of the lot <s> I put my dukes up lithely shifting from side to side with the assured stance of an experienced boxer <s> I think they sensed my confidence baseless as it was <s> They stopped about ten feet away <s> I held my ground <s> Each wore what looked to be an Ed Hardy tee <s> Only I didn 't sense the danger then <s> I was like a cornered puma fiercer because death clears away the vale of fear <s> Underneath the decorated tees the four mens limbs were taut and ready <s> One word one altered expression would have uncapped that explosive energy <s> But there was silence <s> The crack of bat followed by childrens laughter echoed from the top of the hill <s> We measured one another <s> It was the leader who broke the silence <s> His followers relaxed <s> The engagement was apparently broken off or at least postponed for a moment <s> He sai ' <weirdcaps> you limp dicked hipster 'His friends didn 't laugh but chimed in 'Pussy Hipster Faggot 'I didn 't reply <s> I had relaxed my stance <s> The passenger side agitator spat at me again but missed <s> Twenty seconds later the truck was gone and I was left alone in the bright sun <s> My world view was completely fucking shattered <s> What passed through my mind as I gingerly pedaled home was not so much the glorious afterglow of a manly confrontation but the providential nature of my lot in life <s> I knew that so far as the outside world was concerned I was a hipster <s> Whatever innate qualities I possessed were in dichotomous opposition to a certain portion of society whose hatred of my 'type 'acted as a form of self-actualization <s> This tension was absolutely necessary and in a larger sense determined my ultimate role in history <s> I still have not recovered not fully <s> Now when I listen to my own music songs like 'Don 't Try and Take My Guns 'Burning Panties 'and 'You Should Start A Ban ' <weirdcaps> do not hear the voice of myself but someone who struggles to hide the mark of an old wound <s> And while I am ashamed and at times it all seems clownish and sad I remember that this is what makes good art - that is fear and its poignant beauty like a shivering mouse you 've caught in a beam of light <s> My story is that of the reluctant hipster <s> In your wor 'dpretending we 're not hipsters is what we do best 'In this way I am surely the most resourceful of hipsters <s> But unlike so many others it has enriched my art and given me a new purpose or more nearly an enhanced clarity of vision <s> Sincerely Marshall Sea Black Taxi and BLSH Hey Everyone Things are kind of nutty here with SXSW so while I work on a bunch of posts for next week please read a little love letter I wrote to Austin a few months ago <s> Stopped at a traffic light last Friday afternoon I glanced up at a familiar restaurant marquee that usually carried a quip relating to the latest music festival bike rally music rally bike festival in Austin that week <s> However this time the words bore a different sentiment 'Go Texas Win it for Leslie 'The light turned green and I found myself driving south down Congress Avenue with tears pooling at the bottom of my eyelids <s> Every Austinite knows who Leslie is <s> He is the city mascot <s> The epitome of what makes Austin unique <s> For those who do not know him Leslie Cochran is a homeless man who wears a leopard print thong <s> He has run for city mayor multiple times and has been reviewed 53 times on Yelp <s> He is an extremely articulate and sweet-natured man <s> No one has a bad thing to say about Leslie <s> Which is why it is so surprising that unnamed assailants beat Leslie to unconsciousness two weeks ago <s> Leslie was in bad shape and listed in critical condition <s> The townspeople formed a vigil and the local news gave daily updates on his health <s> It was looking like Leslie was not going to make it but miraculously he pulled through and was released from the hospital last week <s> He has since thanked the locals for their support stating that he would have not made it through otherwise <s> Though a percentage of his medical bills have been taken care of there will be a fundraiser on November 1st to help pay the rest <s> By the time I read the sign last Friday I knew that Leslie was alive and well <s> What made me tear up was the realization that I live in a town that cares immensely for an eccentric homeless man <s> It is also a city where that same homeless man can run for mayor multiple times and still get thousands of votes <s> Last month marked my one year anniversary of moving to Austin <s> I moved here with no road map and only what I could fit in my car <s> The plan was to stay a few months and then see where my A ' took me next <s> However whatever energy that made me curious enough to move here has made me stay here <s> I could tell after my first night in Austin that I was someplace special and I haven 't wanted to leave since <s> Each day this city inspires me more and more and at moments I can honestly say that I am in love that could also be because I haven 't had a boyfriend in a long time <s> So in honor of this city that took me in with open arms after fleeing a tumultuous relationship with Los Angeles I will begin using this blog for part-time Austin 'goings-on ' part-time hipstercrite musings not sure who the owner of this picture is but thanks Everyone ought to have a Lower East Side in their lif e- Irving Berlin The East Side has typically been synonymous with art culture history and grit <s> When we venture through LES in NYC or Wicker Park in Chicago or Silver Lake in Los Angeles we feel like we 've stepped back into time that we 're not necessarily welcome and that at any moment something wonderful or terrible might happen <s> This also goes for Austin is east side <s> A vibrant and fascinating part of the city Eastside boasts eclectic eateries trendy bars and dozens of notable art galleries all maintaining the feel of a bygone era <s> Chances are you 'll be spending some time over on the Eastside during SXSW and if so you might want to know where to eat if you aren 't stuffed full of free breakfast tacos supplied at the parties <s> Here is a list of some of the best East Austin restaurants cafes and bars Best Pizz a East Side Pies <date> Rosewood Ave <s> Many will say that Homeslice on <weirdcaps> is the best pizza in Austin but they 're embarrassingly wrong <s> East Side Pies is hands down the best and most imaginative pizza around <s> Try their Veggie Nacho pizza topped with spicy black bean sauce onion tomatoes jalapenos and avocados <s> Or their Blue Moon which is a tomato-less pizza topped with feta mozzarella ricotta goat romano and blue cheeses <s> They also supply delicious salads blondie brownies and bottled sodas <s> The staff is awesomely sassy and the place is a little small and very busy so make sure you don 't dilly-dally <s> Price Cheese slice <date> Meat or veggie slice <date> Best Vegan Vegetarian Mr <s> Natural <date> E <s> Cesar Chavez One of two Mr <s> Natural locations in Austin this restaurant is conveniently located in the heart of the east side <s> Both a restaurant and a health food store Mr <s> Natural supplies an assortment of food options ranging from a vegan vegetarian lunch and dinner bar that changes daily to delicious baked goods to cakes to homemade juices <s> Absolutely worth trying is the Soya Guisada on Fridays and the vegan mint chocolate cupcake <s> You will never think of veganism the same way You wonder why the hell you 're even blogging <s> You speculate if anyone will ever read your words <s> You ponder if life is worth living <s> Well look no further Listed below are twelve sure-fire ways to drive traffic to your blog and instantly boost your self-worth 1 Join Blogging Network Sites - The best blog networking website is Twenty-Something Bloggers <s> Hands down <s> Joining 20sb opened up a whole new world for me <s> Before then I had no idea how to discover other blogs 20sb is a supportive and strong community of like-minded bloggers <s> I can 't recommend it enough <s> Other blogging networks include Blog Lovin ' Blog Her <weirdcaps> and My Blog Log 2 Write Interesting Content - As much as want to go into great detail about your recent trip to the dentist or how you wrapped your Christmas gifts refrain from it <s> Truthfully nobody cares <s> Unless the dentist had a boner while performing your root canal or you lobbed off your finger while cutting wrapping paper for you gifts then we might be interested <s> Humor is a guaranteed way to enter the hearts of millions <s> Take for example Hyperbole-and-a-Half <s> You could learn a lot from her 3 Write About A Trend Topic - I don 't adhere to this rule at all but it is definitely a way to create buzz on your blog <s> Commenting on the cultural importance of 'Jersey Shore 'or how Justin Bieber looks like he should be on the 'L Word 'is a good way to start a convo 4 Befriend Other Bloggers - The blogging community is a tight-knit one <s> I have met people that I am convinced sat next to me at the Algonquin Roundtable in another life <s> These people have encouraged me to grow as a writer and have supported and advertised my work <s> I wouldn 't be where I am today without them and I try to do the same for them <s> As The Beatles once sai ' <weirdcaps> love you take is equal to the love you make ' 5 Leave Comments - Bloggers love comments like Mickey Rourke loves ghastly printed button-ups <s> Our self-esteem begins to slowly hinge on how many comments are left on our blog a day <s> If you comment on our blog we will love you forever and most likely return the favor 6 Brand Yourself- The general consensus on this seems to be 'yucky ' but I disagree <s> The more polished the blog is the greater the chance a reader will take it more seriously no Having a 'brand ishows the world that you are legit <s> Does it take away from the personal aspect of blogging Sometimes <s> But this is where you have to get clever in how you brand yourself <s> Subliminal branding 7 Photos - Photos are a win-win all 'round <s> Photos grab attention <s> Photos can often work in substitute of text Tumblr <s> Photos can inspire <s> I try to put a picture in every single one of my posts even if it is not necessary <s> Like a picture of my ass 8 Lists - We seem to really like lists <s> They 're easy to read and typically very visual <s> Remember the average internet reader is attention span is like 45 seconds I made that up <s> It is kind of true though <s> Think of some of your favorite posts on Buzzfeed or EW com <s> Short and sweet lists 9 Connect With Your Audience- One of the most talked ideas running through the marketing world these days is Lady Gaga is rise to fame due in part to her fan interaction and loyalty <s> <weirdcaps> like <weirdcaps> <s> Also the blogs that appear to have the most comments are blogs where the writer shares a part of him herself with the readers in the post then interacts with them via the comment box <s> Personal is good but don 't forget rule 2 10 Self Promote But Only <math> Of The Time - Nobody likes a showoff <s> However who is going to know about your blog if you don 't say anything I know some very humble bloggers who haven 't even told anyone that they have a blog You have to walk a fine line here <s> Tweet or FB that you have a new post up but don 't send personal messages to strangers telling them to check out your blog <s> Nobody likes that <s> In fact we 'll purposely not go check out your blog 11 Believe That Your Traffic Will Go <smiley> - I know it can get discouraging at times but don 't give up <s> People want to hear what you have to say <s> If you believe that your blog will be successful it most likely will <s> Power of suggestion 12 Post a Picture of Your Ass Keep me posted on your progress I am curious to hear Control System Helium Isolation Value on the right-hand OMS Orbital Maneuvering System fuel system <s> Further testing and troubleshooting steps are being planned at the launch pad to examine two helium system regulators which maintain pressure to the fuel tank and are further down the plumbing from the isolation valves <s> If the regulators are functioning correctly which will be tested later this week when the necessary equipment is ready engineers could determine Discovery can safely fly 'as-is ' despite the isolation valve problem <s> If a repair or replacement to the valve is required we would not be able to access it out at the pad which means rolling the shuttle back to the Vehicle Assembly Building demating Discovery from its external fuel tank and solid rocket boosters then towing Discovery to the Orbiter Processing Facility <s> AND removing the OMS pod <s> Even with the planned testing the April 5 launch date still stands <s> It is what comes out of these test results that will determine if we need to roll back the shuttle which would cause a delay <s> <weirdcaps> successfully fired the Falcon 9 rocket is nine Merlin engines for 3 5 seconds completing a key preflight test before the privately-developed booster is cleared for launch in April <s> Ground test was one of the final steps before launch of the Falcon 9 which is scheduled for no earlier than April 12 <s> The static fire verified all of the launch pad is ground systems are ready to support the mission <s> Between now and launch engineers will install the rocket is flight termination system charges that would destroy the vehicle if it flew off course and threatened the public <s> NASA awarded <weirdcaps> a 1 6 billion contract to fly 12 operational Falcon 9 and Dragon missions to the willing to be as patient as Alex Prager who put on her own shows when gallerists ignored her Does 'everyone ' have 2 <date> followers on Flickr like Ben Roberts Perseverance and determination are to them in ways that make them matter to viewers <s> Yes it is true a lot more people are taking pictures now than when PDN was founded 30 years ago <s> But only a very small percentage of those place with 18 percent humidity well you can imagine what happened <s> The flippiness with a small 'f 'turned into flippiness with a big fat 'F ' <s> And Ashley is not a flippy kind of person <s> She Ashley is in her third year of graduate school working towards her Doctorate in Psychology <s> Her emphasis is on Twin Studies at the University of ______ I still can 't put the name of her school She lives up North where it snows more than I would like but otherwise it is beautiful <s> Ashley is best friend is named Paige <s> Ashley used to like a guy named Robert until the great AC DC Concert Incident last summer <s> Robert and Paige are also psych doctoral students <s> Although Paige is more into Abnorrmal Psychology which is understandable if you 've ever met her <s> Sorry that was petty <s> Bad Amy bad <s> While Ashley is in grad school I am in my second year a '2L ' in law school <s> I can 't give my exact location but I can tell you I live on the coast <s> My interest in law has primarily been in the area of Intellectual Property <s> But I also am interested in other areas which span across the board <s> They say the first year of law school is the worst and mine was no exception <s> In fact I can honestly say last year was the worst year I 've ever had <s> The coursework itself is challenging but not as hard as they make it out to be <s> It wasn 't the work itself I found challenging since I actually like studying the law <s> The people in my life you 've probably heard the most about are my professors for this past semester who Ashley encountered Professor Rogerson Professor Tarkington and Professor Mathews <s> My two closest friends or at least they were up until the Twin Switch are Vicki and Beth <s> I am probably closest to my next-door neighbor Charlie who has taken in a whole lot of his kids and grandkids to live with him <s> He basically has a big ol ' heart and loves to feed and take care of people <s> And dogs <s> He has a beach house right next to mine and actually owns mine too though he rents it out to me <s> Ashley and I are the only kids in our family <s> Our parents live in can I say where they live No Okay They live in a place that is cold too <s> We have great parents who support us financially and emotionally while we are in school <s> Neither of our parents were supposed to know about the Twin Switch but that changed when Ashley told Mom <s> More details about that later <s> We ultimately decided to do the Twin Switch for several reasons 1 <s> Everyone always asks us if we ever switch places and we wanted to see if we could pull it off now that we 're adults 2 <s> Ashley is working on her dissertation involving twins and she wanted to see if her advisor would let her incorporate the data from the switch somehow <s> Her advisor Dr <s> Lyle said she would review Ashley is and my data at the end of the switch to see if there was anything workable for the dissertation <s> I am sure Ashley will give you the scoop on that 3 <s> As mentioned above I had a hard time with law school and was about to give up on it and I wanted to see if there was anything Ashley could do while she was there as me <s> Of course I didn 't -exactly- tell Ashley how bad things were or how much I was relying on her for help <s> But that is because I didn 't know how things would be for her <s> And she told me over and over not to say anything that would alter her behavior during the twin switch <s> Ashley and I also started off trying to think of a bet <s> I would bet we could pull off the switch because I always knew we could and Ashley would bet we couldn 't <s> Unfortunately we couldn 't ever agree on what we would put for the wager <s> Looking back on it I guess we could have used Robert Just ki 'ing The whole thing seemed pretty funny at first and we both had our doubts as to if we would actually even give it a try <s> Then Ashley flew down to visit me and we started getting our hair and nails done to match each other <s> I thought Ashley was going to catch the first flight out when I gave her a tour of the law school showed her where everything was where to sit etc <s> I think that is when reality set in for her <s> I had no idea how freaked out she was until after the switch was over and she admitted what she did the weekend right before school started <s> Ashley told me I shouldn 't mention anything about it but I 'll see if I can put the details in <s> Let is just say Ashley didn 't tell you EVERYTHING she did during the switch <s> I think many of you would be surprised and amused if you heard it all <s> As for me you haven 't heard everything that I went through either <s> Ash and I have agreed to keep this Rated G or PG since we have no idea how old our readers are <s> Sorry that means no graphic details about what went on between Ashley and Professor Tarkington Can I mention that Ashley No Okay You didn 't hear that from me <s> I left for Ashley is condo up North on the weekend right before school started <s> Leaving the ocean was a lot harder than I thought it would be <s> I really felt a loss for some reason and it wasn 't until much later that I figured out why with Robert is and Ashley is help <s> It felt like I was leaving my swingset or something <s> When we were little Ashley and I had the coolest swingset in our back yard with the monkeybars along the top with a swing the rings glider etc <s> It was awesome <s> Then my dad took a job in another state and we had to move <s> Without the swingset <s> Ash and I were mortified and actually grieved for our swingset <s> Anyway that is the same grief I felt when I left the coast and it was haunting for me <s> I couldn 't understand it because I figured the Twin Switch wouldn 't last THAT long and I could go back anytime I wanted thanks to frequent flier miles <s> When the switch ended and Ashley and I were able to sit down and go over everything it was then Ashley told me what she had discovered regarding identity issues for twins during our twin switch <s> It feels like you are leaving yourself behind when you switch places with your twin <s> Anything that is not exactly like your twin you have to cut off <s> Completely <s> Otherwise people who knew Ashley would never believe I was her <s> It is not just leaving my 'life 'that was hard <s> It was leaving ME all the things about me that I like fish crabs etc and having to mentally train myself to like what Ashley likes or Ashley does <s> Mentally it has more of an effect on you that you might think <s> I could never have anticipated how much it would effect me <s> So I arrive up north and I hope I can tell you this part I had Altitude Sickness for awhile because her condo is near the mountains <s> <s> Whether it was when I was growing up or with my own family we have always had a dog <s> A dog was an integral part of my life until now <s> I am dogless <s> And I miss it <s> In my growing up family we had a dog named Spot <s> Original yes Spot was a mutt but she was attractive enough to get a thoroughbred Boston Bull Terrier as her mate and had thirteen little ones that looked just like him <s> But what I remember most was my mom feeding that dog like you wouldn 't believe <s> I can still see her filling up her dish with everything she could find piled high and mumbling in Swedish under her breath about the poor thing having to feed all those pups <s> Didn 't buy dog food in those days <s> At least we didn 't Remember this was during or just after the depression Just table scraps tho I saw Mom give her lots of her homemade bread to fill her up with leftover gravy over all <s> I kept one of the pups and called him Pepper <s> He died of distemper <s> You see we didn 't have all the shots and stuff like that in those days either <s> I wrote what I think was my first poem in my grief over his death <s> In almost 60 years of marriage we 've had numerous dogs <s> I remember Flicka a sort of black golden retriever looking dog who was a renegade and always running away from home <s> I would be teaching school at St <s> Edward is Catholic School about two blocks from our house and I would see Flicka running by <s> I was in my midlife years then--famous for running to the window and opening them to pant and the kids would all yell

We are hoping to conclude these discussions soon 'The FT said that Boris Johnson declined to comment although they believe that Tim O 'Toole has also held discussions with him <s> A number of people were lucky enough to bag tickets to a walking tour of the world is first tunnel under a navigable river <s> Victorians last walked through the tunnel in <date> now <date> years later it was opened to the public for two days <s> The tickets sold out incredibly quickly but luckily for us a number of people have blogged very kindly shared photography <s> Matthew Knight aka webponce has an amazing set of pictures from the Thames Tunnel Tour <s> I love the detail of the original brickwork on the archways below <s> He said 'I 've always wanted to walk down a Tube line and to be able to walk along the Marc Brunel Thames Tunnel was even more special - as the world is first underwater tunnel <s> Much of the original tunnel is still visible at the Rotherhithe end <s> It is amazing to think there were stalls and shops down here <s> Thanks to the guides who showed us around <s> The Thames Tunnel is an underwater tunnel built beneath the River Thames in London United Kingdom connecting Rotherhithe and Wapping <s> It measures 35 feet <math> m wide by 20 feet 6 m high and is 1 <date> feet <math> m long running at a depth of 75 feet <math> m below the river is surface measured at high tide 'Peter Watts was also on the tour this morning 'along with every other transport nerd ' <s> He said 'the tunnel reopened as a foot tunnel for what we were assured will be the very last time in its history which is just the sort of hyperbole I like to hear on a Friday morning <s> The tunnel is now pretty much indistinguishable from any other underground line <s> The only sense you get that you are heading under the river is that it is rather damp and chilly <s> Although most of the tunnel is original brickwork has been concreted over there are some areas where you can still the original bricks beautiful but damaged 'Darryl Chamberlain from <date> blog also went along and said 'The brickwork had concrete applied to it in the <date> s to protect the tunnel said to be the leakiest on the Underground network but after a row broke out between London Transport and preservation agencies a small part close to Rotherhithe station was left alone <s> Rather than a reminder of how the tunnel was the existence of the exposed bri just seems to justify the decision to cover it in concrete in the first place 'Peter continued 'Arches bisect the tunnel throughout its length <s> These were originally used as small shops as the tunnel became the world is first underwater shopping arcade <s> These spaces are tiny and would have been cramped dark cold and damps places to work from <s> I imagine they are rather like those booth-cum-shops you get along Brixton is Atlantic Road where people flog phonecards and reggae from the stairwells of blocks of flats <s> Here though you can get a sense of the detailing that distinguishes so much Victorian architecture <s> Peter is visited a number of other subterranean parts of London deep-level Tube shelter at Chancery Lane you can learn about what got him initially hooked at the rest of his great blog post <s> Thanks to both him Darryl Chamberlain Matthew for sharing the experience photos <s> If you managed to bag a ticket it would station that doesn 't share any letters with the word mackerel <s> A couple of week is ago you might remember I asked what was unique about Pimlico Tube <s> Only one person worked out that it was the ticket sales at station offices with just one in 20 journeys paid for at the counter <weirdcaps> users can submit refund claims for London Underground delays pretty quickly with the launch of two apps claim but with an <weirdcaps> app many people might be more likely to remember to do it <s> You can literally claim while your delay takes place <s> The company behind Tube Refund one of the apps says that there were approximately 1 <date> delays across the Tube network last year <math> delays a week <s> Hopefully you 're not going to get that amount personally but the which only costs 59p could <s> If you 'd been wondering if Draft Blogger was worth trying any doubts should be erased right now <s> You need Draft Blogger to take advantage of the new template design features currently in beta <s> Truly this is not something to wait for it to be released into Blogger proper <s> The thing is as flexible as can be <s> Not only are there 4 basic new templates each with a few versions but most of them let you change the background to one of a large variety of designs or stock photos <s> The fun doesn 't end there <s> You can also customize the layout and by customizing I mean you can customize the overall layout of the blog is body and then pick a layout for the footer which allows for a whole lot of variations <s> You can also vary the widths of the blog and the sidebars <s> Then you can move around your page elements gadgets and choose colors if you don 't like the defaults and you have control over background colors for the page as well as for the gadgets links text etc <s> As before you can a ' in any header image you want using the header element gadget <s> I would think you can also use your own background images if you upload them somewhere ie to Picasa by going into the html and coding it in place of the images that come with the template <s> I haven 't tried that yet

<s> my handspun yarn ma 'er weld walnut camomile In recent years spinning with a hand spindle is something I 've enjoyed during Winter evenings but this past Winter I looked at the spindle and the wool and just did not feel motivated <s> Some Winters are like that for me <s> I get tired easily because of the lack of sunshine <s> Then recently I began to think again about all the wool I have stored some dyed and some undyed and felt inspired <s> So this time around I am spinning for Spring and so am working toward a Spring project <s> At the moment I am dyeing and spinning and then will begin to knit some kind of simple scarf-throw project <s> I 'll begin the knitting on the Spring Equinox the day I consider to be that all important 'first day of ' - so that is this Saturday <s> I 'll knit and continue to dye wool and spin and will work through April hoping to complete sometime in early May <s> But there is no rush <s> This is a project for myself something to enjoy in the evenings now the days feel longer <s> The wool used is a mix of British breeds Shetland Shropshire and Falklands and some merino I have had for a while <s> Mostly these days if I buy wool tops to dye spin it will be from a supplier who sells rare British breeds because I find that more interesting to use <s> I 'll hope to share the project as it moves along - in simple stripes of natural colours <s> I am not a very adept knitter I like to keep it simple and can 't be asked to follow knitting pattern instructions I 'll be knitting the singles rather than plyed wool because I find I can spin quite balanced singles and they knit up quite pleasantly enough <s> I am dyeing the wool using mostly my tried and tested solar jar method <s> For dyes such as weld I am cooking up the dried dyestuff and then straining the dye solution pouring it into a jar to use <s> Some dyes such as ma 'er will work well if put into the jar and covered with hot water from the kettle but weld and alkanet for another example are dyestuffs that from my experience need a little more persuasion <s> I really like the yellows of weld on wool and yellows will be the main hue for this Spring project <s> As a brief follow-on from yesterday is post examples of handwriting using the same monoprint method <s> Yes you do need to write in mirror style <s> So I am constantly telling myself b is d and d is b <s> These will become something more in the near future <s> Thank you very much for all your comments re yesterdays monoprint drawing post <s> I am pleased you found it interesting <s> A drawing and its inky shadow the various attempts I made working toward the one drawing I decided to use <s> I had the idea of a figure seated on a chair a shape of a figure rather than a detailed human person <s> But the figure wears shoes <s> And the chair because chairs are one of my 'things ' had to be just a very simple form <s> The figures are all rather bizarre because I drew with my eyes closed <s> Yes I do like a challenge but I knew this was the way for me to get the result I had in mind <s> Above are photos I took whilst working on drawings for my latest zine 'dreamers ' still a few copies available in my shop <s> Today no mosaic this Monday next week - I thought I would finally write about my own approach to making monoprint drawings <s> I 've written before but several people have asked me to explain a little about how etc and I am happy to put this post together as my own technique and approach changes over time <s> Making these drawings does not require a printers press or any other specialist equipment <s> I like to make things that require the most basic of things needle and thread paper and pencil and for monoprint drawing ink paint glass paper drawing tool <s> I use a sheet of glass from an old picture frame <s> I use either printers ink the type you might use for lino or water-mixable oil paint <s> In recent times I have preferred the latter as I like the thickness and texture of the paint it has a slow drying time and allows a variety of results from very inky and dark to cloudy to light and fine lines <s> The paint ink is spread across the glass quite evenly and if you prefer you can use a roller but I use my fingers because I like the slight uneven and fingerprinty result <s> When I am making monoprint drawings I am working toward an expressive image perhaps primitive minimalist even <s> There are some drawings that are more elaborate but mostly I am not aiming toward the fine exactness of an etching for example <s> I am happy to play with chance <s> My drawings with pencil are very different <s> When I draw in my sketchbook see sketchbook sundays posts for examples I use the eraser as a tool for both editing and blending <s> And I will make many adjustments sometimes before I get a pencil drawing just so <s> With monoprint drawing there is no rubbing out and editing a certain area though you can work with amistakes ' and go with the flow <s> A sheet of paper is placed over the inked glass and then you draw <s> Once you have finished drawing you flip over the paper and there is your monoprinted image <s> I draw with a long darning needle <s> So when I am drawing I am just denting gently into the paper and not making any easily seen impression <s> I have to work in good light so that I can see the finely dented lines <s> Or I can take advantage of not seeing my drawing and can work 'blind ' which offers interesting results too <s> Either way I have to be careful not to lean on the paper too much although a few inky smudges made my fingers holding the paper in place are quite acceptable and desirable for me <s> It is all about finding your own style and technique of working of course <s> I am showing many examples here but urge anyone who wishes to try monoprint drawing to draw in their own way and to learn through experience which does take paper and time <s> Finding your own way of making marks is that big leap toward feeling like you are making something that is truly your own <s> I can get inspired by other artists of course but return again and again to my own obsessions <s> Here is an example of quite a tiny drawing - showing you the inked glass image too <s> You can see here there is a modest about of paint smeared across the glass <s> This drawing was made after several previous drawings <s> Here is the first drawing I made during a brief session this morning <s> I had prepared the glass and left it a short while to allow the water-based oil paint to dry just a little <s> I thought I would work on a simple series of drawings to demonstrate - so chose one of my 'things ' - long-eared things rabbits and hares <s> I made a series of little quirky rabbit drawings <s> Because my inked glass was smaller than the paper area I lifted and shifted the paper so that is why the glass does not match up with the drawing I attempted to draw a girl holding a rabbit <s> Wishing to aim for a quite primitive drawing <s> You can see my attempts starting left to right <s> I like the first drawing best - because it features an echo of a previous drawing left in the ink and because I like the really smudgy drawings <s> Shadow girl and rabbit Various drawings showing the different quality of line achieved in one drawing session <s> Here you can see my first drawing in the centre and then as I continued to draw so I switched paper to a smoother cartridge paper that is best for showing fine line <s> Further tips experiment with using different inks paints and colours <s> Do not limit yourself to one type of paper <s> I also try and use old envelopes fabric tissue paper etc <s> If you are wishing to try this with young children or less able folk and would prefer not to use glass - then try very glossy paper or plastic folders <s> Just smear the paint ink across very thinly and experiment <s> I 've made drawings in the past using the cover of an old magazine as my 'glass ' <s> You can also use perspex of course <s> Instead of drawing with a needle as I do other drawing tools to use are of course etching tools pointed tips of ceramics tools sharpened pencils cocktail sticks <s> I hope this post has been both insightful and interesting to you <s> This week I am very busy working toward many new things for my shop update on the 24th <s> I am also dyeing lots of wool for a particular project but I 'll write about that tomorrow <s> Have a happy Monday x This last one is still in progress <s> It is in my new A3 size moleskine - so much bigger <s> This book will be a challenge for me <s> I 've still quite a lot of work to do on this one I feel but have taken a shot just to record where I am at today <s> You never know this one might change quite radically or may wait a while before I work on it some more <s> I 've also been writing notes toward new poems <s> And spinning dyed wool to knit a Spring throw <s> I 'll share more of this project next week <s> It has been Mothering Sunday in the UK today <s> A lovely Spring day <s> I hope you had a good one <s> A 'yesterdays ' in grey and gold <s> I wanted to make a more elaborate doll - with ruffles <s> Her skirt is edged with vintage velvet ribbon <s> She is a isalon couture ruffles ' kind of girl <s> Thank you for your kind comments feedback re my zine I am pleased to know those who have received UK people mostly of course are enjoying this one <s> This helps me to know cheers me as I continue to think on new ideas for both drawing and poetry <s> I wish you a very good weekend x A drawing from my <s> Dreaming of traveling to Buenos Aires Argentina The makers of Bueno entonces the hot new Spanish language learning software are trying to build their Facebook cred by reaching 10 <date> Fans by March <s> If they get there one lucky fan and a friend will win a trip to Buenos Aires Argentina for 10 days of intensive Spanish lessons a chance to meet the cast and crew and me too and of course have way too much fun <s> From now until March 12th Bueno entonces is offering a series of contests on the Facebook Page which offers free daily Spanish phrases words and grammar lessons <date> participants will be chosen as Finalists from the series of contests and will be entered to win the Grand Prize Trip <s> The complete contest details are posted on the Bueno entonces <s> Fan Page <s> They 've to a super-simple photo contest <s> To enter just snap a picture of yourself holding a sign saying 'I want to win a trip to Argentina 'and post it to their Facebook wall <s> Then get your friends to 'like ' and comment on it <s> But HURRY The TEN finalists with the most 'likes ' will be selected on Friday February 5 <s> So polish up your tango shoes and hurry and go check it out <s> About the program Bueno entonces is like Rosetta Stone meets The Simpsons - the program is comprehensive but at the same time hilarious and really engaging <s> Just released last year it has been already featured in the <weirdcaps> App Store and on the Daily Candy website <s> To see more check out their Learn Spanish website <s> I have taken my share of Spanish classes believe me <s> Some were good some were not so good <s> But none were as funny or as motivating as the Bueno entonces program <s> Witty and wry with more than a bit of adult humor it is like watching a favorite <smiley> show--you can 't wait for the next episode Though it is definitely geared to the twentysomething crowd even old folks like Tom and me laughed out loud during many of the lessons <s> It is sexy--in a fun way <s> And since this is the Sexy Spanish Club blog well I feel that I must recommend this as it is THE sexiest Spanish-learning program out there <s> The two characters--the hot Argentine teacher Jimena and the kinda goofy student David definitely develop a certain chemistry <s> It makes it fun <s> Will they--or won 't they I am not telling - For those planning on visiting Argentina you should know that this is the ONLY Argentine-oriented Spanish program available <s> It tells you how to pronounce things the Argentine way and includes plenty of cultural references and helpful and entertaining slang <s> Plus it is portable it can be instantly downloaded to your <weirdcaps> <weirdcaps> Smartphone or laptop <s> No need for that sweaty bus or Subte ride to a class and no books to lug around--just plug in and learn and laugh What are you waiting for gringo Get started on your own sexy Spanish here <s> No not really <s> Though it is true that my husband and I just bought a small farm in Uruguay we are keeping our studio apartment in Buenos Aires and plan to visit regularly <s> After all it is only two hours away and we have two daughters living in Buenos Aires and many friends--and though we plan to live a quiet life in the country focusing on farming and writing we will want a blast of city life every now and then Why did we buy the farm It was unexpected <s> We visited some friends--an expat couple British and French who had spent twenty years in New York--who had just purchased a farm <s> We saw how they were living and it was just so appealing that we couldn 't get the idea out of our heads <s> Two weeks later we 'd bought our own place or at least started the process <s> The real estate transaction went very well--quick smooth very nice owners who worked with us directly without using an agent <s> What appeals to us about it is the challenge of living even more simply of connecting to the land developing re-developing <s> I grew up on a farm our skills in terms of planting growing and harvesting our own food and living in a <math> year-old farmhouse without succumbing to our American instincts to redo and rebuild <s> It is beautifully simple as is but not perfect--and we are looking forward to being okay with that <s> Most of all we love the idea of investing in land of being in a beautiful place and getting to know our neighbors in a setting that encourages cooperation bartering and sharing <s> And okay I can 't help but think that it will be a really fun place for our eventual grandkids to visit - But Buenos Aires is in my heart and always will be <s> I love it and I really appreciate the creativity of the people locals and expats <s> It inspires me makes me think makes me laugh and helps me appreciate life <s> I know I 'll feel the same way about life on the farm in Uruguay--but in different ways <s> Thought I 'd update this blog--I am posting regularly on my New Globals blog these days <s> I 've even posted some fun little videos about finding my book in Barnes amp Noble and meeting my agent for the first time I wrote the book in Argentina and did everything via email and most recently seeing my book in a bookstore window here in New York <s> My book The New Global Student Skip the SAT Save Thousands on Tuition and Get a Truly International Education was published by Random House on the 19th and Tom and I are in New York for a month <s> Generally authors do a book tour sort of thing but we 're doing things differently We 've had a great time hanging out with three of our daughters here celebrated been fantastic <s> We chose this location just on the edge of Belgrano three years ago when we had two daughters living with us and it couldn 't have been more perfect in terms of proximity to their schools--Islands International School and Universidad de Belgrano and an easy bus or train ride to Lincoln University College <s> Just a couple of blocks from the Subte D line Congreso de Tucuman stop so you almost always get a seat and four blocks from the NuÒez train station with bus 29 running right in front of our apartment as well <s> We have great neighbors and our sweet little street is quiet with very friendly people <s> Our building Love it <s> Only three years old with a lovely pool and parilla area on the roof a small gym and a large sauna <s> There are only two apartments on each floor and ours is facing the back instead of the street <s> Despite the fact that we 're only a couple of blocks from Cabildo what wakes us up in the morning is birds in the trees below we 're on the seventh floor <s> So why are we selling it Well regular readers will know that I just wrote a book and in May Tom and I will be going to the <smiley> for the book launch and promotional tour and we have no idea how long we will be staying <s> It could be two months but it might be six or eight months depending on speaking engagements and other opportunities <s> Also we purchased a studio traffic to recommend a guided kayak tour of the Delta that I took last week <s> I have been up to Tigre and the Delta several times it is only about 30 minutes from our apartment in Belgrano via train <s> Though the town of Tigre itself is worth a trip I generally skip it to get out to the islands in the Delta <s> Generally we have taken the Interisla Collectivos passenger boats that act as buses between the islands and have gotten off at a restaurant pier or someplace else to go hiking <s> We have also rented a house for a weekend <s> But what I really wanted to do was explore the myriad of small canals and channels that the larger boats cannot get into <s> Based on fellow expat Jonathan Harada is advice http tutoramigos blogspot com we contacted Martin at <repeatedchars> eldoradokayak com <s> Martin met us at the station and had already purchased tickets for the collectivo boat out to their island camp <s> I have been on the same route before though it was totally different as Martin is very knowledgeable about the Delta and during the entire 1 5 hour boat ride he gave us great information about the route <s> The last stop of the collectivo is their camp house <s> Serenely quiet the small canal had very few houses <s> All that we could hear was the winds in the leaves and the chirping of the birds <s> Martin is partner Chapa had a light lunch ready for us set nicely around a picnic table in the jungle clearing <s> Their house is simple but new clean with full changing and shower facilities <s> After a brief instruction on pa 'ling techniques we set off in double and singles--very stable kayaks that were almost brand new <s> Time is different in the Delta and the two-three hours we spent blissfully pa 'ling the small canals and channels flew by <s> My two daughters were hesitant to go initially worried they were not strong enough and completely enjoyed the experience <s> Our route took us through darker narrow passages as well as past grand houses on one of the larger rivers and then into seemingly untouched portions of jungle <s> When we got back a lovely lunch of sausage sandwiches tomato salad and vino patero awaited <s> Chapa and Martin are wonderful conversationalists and our hour lunch turned into a three hour again time in the Delta is different discussion of Argentine politics culture and life on the Delta <s> When you visit Buenos Aires take this tour you will not be disappointed <s> I have traveled a fair bit and the Delta is like nowhere I have been before and Eldorado Kayaks let me see it up close and personal <s> Some people like to do the look-back-over-the-last-year thing on December 31st <s> I prefer to do the what-a-cool-year-it is-going-to-be thing on New Year is Day <s> For the Frost family lots of good have rated over <date> titles on Netflix com <s> I use Netflix as my main repository of movie ratings <s> I like to know how I rated a movie in case someone asks me <s> Sometimes I can 't remember if I 've seen a movie or if I liked it enough to see it again so I refer to my Netflix rating <s> Having to refer to Netflix is inconvenient sometimes <s> I don 't want to have to start over from scratch with ratings on every movie Web site <s> What if I quit Netflix What is going to happen to all those ratings Now I can keep them <s> The <weirdcaps> Web app allows you to take your Netflix ratings <s> Two things of note I love Bruno Ganz as an actor and I rate every movie I 've seen on Netflix com <s> I am thrilled to learn from a comment left here by Ken that Leonard Maltin is Movie Guide is now available on the <weirdcaps> and <weirdcaps> Touch <s> I bought mine from the App Store for <date> which is a third of what the book costs <s> The advantages of it over other applications is that you don 't have to be connected to the Internet to look up movie details <s> You get plot summaries star ratings cast and director <s> You can search the database by title cast or director to get filmographies <s> I do this all the time when I am out with friends <s> We 'll be talking about movies and they ask me what other movies has an actor been in What other movies has someone directed They think I am the movie expert and I keep them impressed by using Leonard Maltin is Movie Guide <s> Another advantage is that you can create your own custom lists or a ' to Favorites or Movies to See which you can backup online <s> There is also a button to a ' movies to your Netflix queue requires an Internet connection <s> I 've been waiting for this ever since I gave up my Palm T X <s> A
