<s> Having mono during school has been really difficult for me <s> I am constantly tired <s> Not only is it hard for me to wake up in the morning it is hard for me to find the motivation to go to class study and get work done <s> The doctor said the fatigue could go away in 2 weeks and it could last for 3 months <s> It is been almost 3 weeks and I feel just as tired as before I can already tell that this is not going to be a dean is list semester <s> I am disappointed with myself but I feel so helpless <s> I can 't even ask my teachers for a break because UHS won 't give me permission to miss any classes Not only is my academic life suffering but so is my social life and my emotional well-being <s> I don 't have the energy to straighten my hair any more and my self-esteem takes a hit every time I look in the mirror <s> I think the huge bags underneath my eyes are permanent <s> The apartment is a mess too which I can 't live with <s> Cluttered house cluttered mind <s> You 're supposed to lose weight with mono but all I can do is sit on the couch and I am not allowed to exercise so I fear I am gaining weight I need to turn this around <s> This is a challenge <s> If I got dean is list this semester I would be incredibly proud of myself <s> I know I shouldn 't be straining myself but I need to push myself because right now I am not really pushing myself at all 
<s> As I 've been gleefully exclaiming to all and sundry on my Youtube channel yesterday I went for some Afternoon Tea the very phrase conjures pomposity unlimited and therefore regally requires capital letters at a very posh hotel in London with an intimidating dress code and a price list even more so <s> So finally after a lot of to-ing and fro-ing and wandering about the flat in semi-constructed and poorly-considered outfit choices we finally managed to mobilise our troops and begin our expedition to somewhere a little different I held Kiwi is hand as we nervously shuffled past the doormen of the Connaught Hotel and crossed the threshold half expecting to be rebuffed by a cross-looking moustache in a top hat and tails or for the unsmiling host blocking our entry to our desired destination to tell us that we were unsuitably attired or our reservation could not be located Feeling none of the bravado of Red Riding Hood I felt a little lost in the woods as we were ushered to a seat and sat down before my seat was pushed in <s> Luckily there was no slapstick tumble to the floor rather an awkward pause as I calculated the distance between myself and the table and the danger of dropping one of those so-carefully prepared pastries into that unavoidable gap <s> I stood up awkwardly and let the nice lady with the grey suit push my chair in a little further 
<s> There is so much to say <s> Every little nuance of life becomes exaggerated when you 're in the hospital <s> Every interaction becomes multiplied in meaning <s> Every small exchange between me and the saviors-in-scrubs became a desperate reliance on their expertise and kindness I feel like the hospital is the gateway from death into brith and life into death <s> I was born in one and I 've been near death in many <s> My hospital visits for my various illnesses and surgeries are like the punctuations in my rambling life Yesterday is surgery went well and by well I mean my knee should be improving and I didn 't die My surgeon explained the amess amy knee was in <s> There was the 'fracture 'in the cartilage fairly new happened 11 months ago that needed to be cleaned up <s> Then there was the bone-on-bone arthritis that had to be dealt with <s> Meniscus shavings were all over the place causing pain and inflammation <s> He cleaned up what best he could <s> We 'll be doing protein injections in about a month to ease the arthritis <s> I am optimistic The pain is pretty bad but I have plenty of pain killers <s> I was urged to take them and to get rest <s> No need to be the tough-guy by not taking the meds <s> See pain is a signal to the body that something is wrong <s> Pain puts the body in crisis mode <s> Fight or flight crisis responses do not facilitate healing <s> Taking the pain killers and resting tells the body that it is time to heal <s> Now if only I would stop fussing around the house and get some rest <punctuationfreak> 
<s> The second man fumbled with his hands as he stood behind his friend <s> I realized the second man was mentally challenged and the blue-eyed gentleman was his salvation <s> I held my tears as I stood there with them The young lady at the counter asked him what they wanted <s> He said 'Coffee is all Miss ' because that was all they could afford If they wanted to sit in the restaurant and warm up they had to buy something <s> He just wanted to be warm <s> Then I really felt it - the compulsion was so great I almost reached out and embraced the little man with the blue eyes That is when I noticed all eyes in the restaurant were set on me judging my every action <s> I smiled and asked the young lady behind the counter to give me two more breakfast meals on a separate tray <s> I then walked around the corner to the table that the men had chosen as a resting spot <s> I put the tray on the table and laid my hand on the blue-eyed gentleman is cold hand <s> He looked up at me with tears in his eyes and said 'Thank you ' I leaned over began to pat his hand and said 'I did not do this for you <s> God is here working through me to give you hope <s> I started to cry as I walked away to join my husband and son <s> When I sat down my husband smiled at me and said 'That is why God gave you to me Honey to give me hope ' We held hands for a moment and at that time we knew that only because of the Grace that we had been given were we able to give In my own way I had touched the people at <weirdcaps> is my son the instructor and every soul that shared the classroom on the last night I spent as a college student

<s> OK How many of you like to receive a nice letter in the mail from a friend I know I do Even though most of the time I get the mail from the mailbox it is junk mail I still enjoy the wonder of 'will there be a letter 'On small occasions there is a letter that you open and savor A nice card from a friend far away with actual hand written words possibly in a colorful pen You read it once you read it twice you may read it everyday for a week or longer It inspires you to write one back and maybe even write a letter to a different friend In this technological world we all email face book blog etc and don 't get me wrong I love them all but what has happening to letter writing We say we have no time but really how many hours do we spend on the computer blogging or facebooking <s> So why has this art form lost its value It has lost its value so much that post offices are closing Mail delivery may be shortened by a day I had the wonderful opportunity to live on Martha is Vineyard for a period of my life <s> During that time I was an avid letter writer Nothing like living on a New England Island in winter to motivate letter writing There was this wonderful little store in Vineyard Haven called Paper Tiger It was filled with uniques cards papers pens stamps and stationary sets I would walk into town and peruse the store for hours picking out just the right cards for people and write letters I think I will make someone happy this week and write them a letter and in the mean time support the postal service Just think what would happen if it closed Many books and history have been written and recorded through letters Let is keep our history going Happy writing

<s> I have become just a little bit wrapped up in this weight loss process and all the new things I am discovering about me my habits around food alternative forms of exercise and life in general I have shared all of my thoughts with you on this blog but I really don 't want this blog to be a weight loss blog I started Living The Life Of Tere to be about my life my family my thoughts Me Me Me Weight loss is a part of my life but it is not the only part of me But I had things I wanted to share with others about weight loss things that have helped friends and others I started to put off writing here about some funny things my kids did and other stories so I could post some weight loss stories That is not really where I wanted things to go I decided I needed to compartmentalize my life a bit when it comes to sharing my life with others So I did something that makes no sense with the small amount of time I have <s> I started a separate weight loss blog One where I can share my thoughts on weight loss food diary successes and failures low calorie recipes tips and tricks from others reviews of products other people is success stories for those that are interested in that type of thing

<s> Where I come from it is A small island of the coast of North Carolina called 'Cape Hatteras Islan 'd known for the tallest Lighthouse in our nation <s> It is also known for its beaches white sands surfing waves and it is treacherous Diamond Shoals <s> It has a very rich full history in many areas of our past wars pirates and tourism <s> Many stories fill my head and my heart over flows with the memories I myself have on that little sandy beach I called home for most of my life My family moved to Cape Hatteras when I was a very young girl I believe I began the 3rd grade there on the island <s> We moved across the states from Bremerton Washington with my father is job in the <smiley> Navy <s> Of course moving to the island at that time brought great change in my life and back then it truly was just a little island full of mom and pop shops and restaurants little tourism and 1 full military base As a child our days were spent playing with the neighboring children playing in the park or making a trip over the dunes to play at the beach <s> In many ways it was ideal yet in today is society by many standards it would be considered lacking on so many levels

<s> How do you deal with grief i found myself crying last night as i watched a tv show and one of the main characters painfully re-entered the same location where her daughter was su 'enly taken from her it reminded me of the night my puppy chucky was taken now i know an animal can 't really be compared to a human loss but my little puppy was my angel my shadow and my baby i still grieve over the loss and i still see the accident in my head on a regular basis <s> So this wont get me any fans but i am a self proclaimed high school bully i am not ashamed of it because it is how i survived high school i didn 't bully every one i just picked on certain people and most of the time it was retaliation for shit they had already done to me but since school has finished i left my bullying days behind me i left every one alone <s> So my question tonight is how do you deal with people who you cant really get rid of The current pain in my ass happens to be my boyfriends best friends partner so i cant really stomp on her and then scrape her off the bottom of my shoe 
<s> There are many things in life that make me happy <s> Little things things that just make me smile <s> One of my favorites is Post Secret Sundays <s> Post Secret is a project started a few years ago by a man named Frank <s> Frank left a few postcards in a few public places with simple instructions <s> Write a secret on it decorate it if you like and send it in anonymously to the a 'ress already written on the card <s> It grew into quite a phenomena <s> Now Frank gets postcards from all over the world <s> He is compiled them and published more than one book <s> And every Sunday Frank posts a new set of secrets on postsecret com <s> Even with the books and the website only a fraction of the secrets are viewed Every Sunday I log on to my computer excited to see the new secrets <s> It is a simple pleasure that I truly enjoy <s> The secrets are often sad sometimes disturbing occasionally funny but always insightful Everyone has secrets <s> Little secrets like you really don 't like your friend is new haircut <s> Unimportant secrets like it was you who ate all the blueberries an actual secret that made me laugh out loud <s> And big important secrets ones you don 't even dare think about for fear of inexplicably blurting out loud simply from the weight of it

<s> I love The Biggest Loser and believe it can truly motivate people to get help when they can 't figure out how to help themselves but the contestants get bigger and their stories sa 'er each season <s> All fat people are not sad <s> Some of us have dated and been loved and really like ourselves but want to live healthy active lives so we change our bad habits and work hard to get rid of the weight we so blindly allowed to take over <s> But people need to realize that being skinny is a lot like winning the lottery <s> It is great and some things are easier but all your emotional issues are still there until you DO something about them Maybe self-confidence really WAS my problem <s> I was ok my life was ok <s> I was happy <s> So I never did anything about the weight that kept creeping on <s> I have done something about it several times over the last few years but really only half-heartedly because I felt like I SHOULD <s> But I am doing it this time and I am very serious about it 
<s> I just love and cherish the place where I was born because I am a friend cousin niece and gran 'aughter of people who reside in Israel <s> I also happen to LOVE the scenery food and environment of my homeland <s> Fine so I lied a bit <s> I would hate to see Israel non-existent or unrecognized <s> Which definitely means I am NOT anti-Israel <s> I am also pro-peace <s> Glad we got that out of the way A little history on how I got into this whole pro-Israel mess I was born in Rishon Le-Tzion Israel <s> I lived there until I was eight except for a brief year when my parents decided to venture off to Hong Kong and get all these stamps on my passport from all of Eastern Asia <s> Too bad all I have is the passport <s> I moved to the Silicon Valley where I only started to value and recognize my Israeli identity in high school <s> I got really involved in a youth group called Tzofim and dreamed of joining the Israel Defense Forces after high school as early as freshman year <s> I spent every summer vacation in Israel during my high school years <s> Summers were all I looked forward to <s> Did I mention the Silicon Valley has a huge Israeli community Well this was a huge factor for my ability to stay connected to my culture instead of diving into the big melting pot of american society Well as it turns out there aren 't many Israelis in San Diego where I go to school <s> Thus when looking to get involved with the Israeli community at UCSD I was right away pointed to the direction of Israel advocacy <s> This is where this whole pro anti thing comes in <s> Israel advocacy is basically feeding everyone and their mom the greatness of Israel through it is diversity innovations and did I mention- it is the only democracy in the mi 'le east It is making sure Jews are pro-Israel and non-Jews are simply not anti <s> Sometimes I feel as if it one big brainwash <s> But I live for it So <s> I am going to Israel this summer simply to enjoy every beautiful and humid moment

<s> What if you could have forty million dollars completely tax free but you could never spend more than two days in the same city <s> This means that you 'd have to move all your stuff every two days You could rotate cities but you 'd have to put three cities in between every rotation So if you wanted to go back to whatever city you 're from you would have to make sure you stayed six days at three other cities before going back Would you take the money and resign yourself to the life of a nomad or would you stay put and live where you wanted for however long you wanted I don 't know what I 'd do If I took the money I 'd definitely invest in an rv i don 't know if I could do that forever though Not having to work ever would be nice but I may want to stay somewhere sometimes What would you do
